GV03sb_07_u:1: gārhapatyaṃ ceṣyanpalāśaśākhayā vyudūhati | avasyati haitadyadgārhapatyaṃ cinoti
GV03sb_07_u:2: ya u vai ke cāgnicito 'syāmeva te 'vasitāstadyadvyudūhatyavasitāneva tadvyudūhati
GV03sb_07_u:5: apeta vīta vi ca sarpatāta iti | apa caivaita vi ceta vyu ca sarpatāta ityetadya
GV03sb_07_u:6: udarasarpiṇastānetadāha ye 'tra stha purāṇa ye ca nūtanā iti ye 'tra stha sanātanā ye
GV03sb_07_u:9: adādyamo 'vasānam pṛthivyā iti | yamo ha vā asyā avasānasyeṣṭe sa evāsmā
GV03sb_07_u:12: akrannimam pitaro lokamasmā iti | kṣatraṃ vai yamo viśaḥ pitaro yasmā u vai
GV03sb_07_u:13: kṣatriyo viśā saṃvidāno 'syāmavasānaṃ dadāti tatsudattaṃ tatho hāsmai kṣatraṃ
GV03sb_07_u:16: palāśaśākhayā vyudūhati | brahma vai palāśo brahmaṇaiva tadavasitānvyudūhati
GV03sb_07_u:17: mantreṇa brahma vai mantro brahmaṇaiva tadavasitānvyudūhati tāmudīcīmudasyati
GV03sb_07_u:19: athoṣānnivapati | ayaṃ vai loko gārhapatyaḥ paśava ūṣā asmiṃstalloke paśūndadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:22: yadvevoṣānnivapati | prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjatā tā nānolbā asṛjata tā na samajānata so
GV03sb_07_u:24: tasmādapyetarhi samānolbāḥ sameva jānate devaiḥ samānolbo 'sānītyu vai yajate yo
GV03sb_07_u:27: sajñānamasīti | samajānata hyetena kāmadharaṇamiti paśavo vā ūṣāḥ kāmadharaṇam
GV03sb_07_u:28: mayi te kāmadharaṇam bhūyāditi mayi te paśavo bhūyāsurityetattaiḥ sarvaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:29: gārhapatyam pracādayati yonirvai gārhapatyā citirulbamūṣāḥ sarvāṃ tadyonimulbena
GV03sb_07_u:32: atha sikatā nivapati | agneretadvaiśvānarasya bhasma yatsikatā agnimu vā etaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:33: vaiśvānaraṃ ceṣyanbhavati na vā agniḥ svam bhasmātidahatyanatidāhāya
GV03sb_07_u:35: yadveva sikatā nivapati | agneretadvaiśvānarasya reto yatsikatā agnimu vā etaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:36: vaiśvānaraṃ ceṣyanbhavati na vā aretaskātkiṃ cana vikriyate 'smādretaso 'dhi
GV03sb_07_u:39: agnerbhasmāsyagneḥ purīṣamasīti | yātayāma vā agnerbhasmāyātayāmnyaḥ sikatā
GV03sb_07_u:40: ayātayāmamevainadetatkaroti tābhiḥ sarvaṃ gārhapatyam pracādayati yonirvai
GV03sb_07_u:41: gārhapatyā citī retaḥ sikatāḥ sarvasyāṃ tadyonau reto dadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:43: athainam pariśridbhiḥ pariśrayati | yonirvai pariśrita idamevaitadretaḥ siktaṃ yonyā
GV03sb_07_u:46: yadvevainam pariśridbhiḥ pariśrayati | ayaṃ vai loko gārhapatya āpaḥ pariśrita imaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:47: taṃ lokamadbhiḥ paritanoti samudreṇa hainaṃ tatparitanoti sarvatastasmādimaṃ lokaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:48: sarvataḥ samudraḥ paryeti dakṣiṇāvṛttasmādimaṃ lokaṃ dakṣiṇāvṛtsamudraḥ paryeti
GV03sb_07_u:49: khātena tasmādimaṃ lokaṃ khātena samudraḥ paryeti
GV03sb_07_u:51: cita stheti | cinoti hyenāḥ paricita stheti pari hyenāścinotyūrdhvacitaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:52: śrayadhvamityūrdhvā upadadhadāha tasmādūrdhva eva samudro vijate 'tha
GV03sb_07_u:56: asthīni vai pariśritaḥ | prāṇaḥ sūdadohā na vā asthiṣu prāṇo 'styekena yajuṣā
GV03sb_07_u:57: bahvīriṣṭakā upadadhātyekaṃ hyetadrūpaṃ yadāpo 'tha yadbahvyaḥ pariśrito
GV03sb_07_u:60: tadvai yoniḥ pariśritaḥ | ulbamūṣā retaḥ sikatā bāhyāḥ pariśrito bhavantyantara ūṣā
GV03sb_07_u:61: bāhyā hi yonirantaramulbam bāhya ūṣā bhavantyantarāḥ sikatā bāhyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:62: hyulbamantaraṃ reta etebhyo vai jāyamāno jāyate tebhya evainametajjanayati
GV03sb_07_u:64: athainamataścinoti | idamevaitadretaḥ siktaṃ vikaroti tasmādyonau retaḥ siktaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:67: sa catasraḥ prācīrupadadhāti | dve paścāttiraścyau dve purastāttadyāścatasraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:68: prācīrupadadhāti sa ātmā tadyattāścatasro bhavanti caturvidho hyayamātmātha ye
GV03sb_07_u:69: paścātte sakthyau ye purastāttau bāhū yatra vā ātmā tadeva śiraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:71: taṃ vā etam | atra pakṣapucavantaṃ vikaroti yādṛgvai yonau reto vikriyate
GV03sb_07_u:75: taṃ vai pakṣapucavantameva santam | na pakṣapucavantamiva paśyanti
GV03sb_07_u:76: tasmādyonau garbhaṃ na yathārūpam paśyantyathainamamutra pakṣapucavantam
GV03sb_07_u:79: sa catasraḥ pūrvā upadadhāti | ātmā hyevāgre sambhavataḥ sambhavati dakṣiṇata
GV03sb_07_u:83: ayaṃ so agniḥ | yasmintsomamindraḥ sutaṃ dadha ityayaṃ vai loko gārhapatya āpaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:84: somaḥ suto 'smiṃstalloke 'pa indro 'dhatta jaṭhare vāvaśāna iti madhyaṃ vai jaṭharaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:85: sahasriyaṃ vājamatyaṃ na saptimityāpo vai sahasriyo vājaḥ sasavāntsantstūyase
GV03sb_07_u:86: jātaveda iti citaḥ saṃścīyase jātaveda ityetat
GV03sb_07_u:88: agne yatte divi varca iti | ādityo vā asya divi varcaḥ pṛthivyāmityayamagniḥ pṛthivyāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:89: yadoṣadhīṣvapsvā yajatreti ya evauṣadhiṣu cāpsu cāgnistametadāha
GV03sb_07_u:90: yenāntarikṣamurvātatantheti vāyuḥ sa tveṣaḥ sa bhānurarṇavo nṛcakṣā iti mahāntsa
GV03sb_07_u:93: agne divo arṇamacā jigāsīti | āpo vā asya divo 'rṇastā eṣa dhūmenācaityacā devāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:94: ūciṣe dhiṣṇyā ya iti prāṇā vai devā dhiṣṇyāste hi sarvā dhiya iṣṇanti yā rocane
GV03sb_07_u:95: parastātsūryasya yāścāvastādupatiṣṭhanta āpa iti rocano ha nāmaiṣa loko yatraiṣa
GV03sb_07_u:96: etattapati tadyāścaitam pareṇāpo yāścāvareṇa tā etadāha
GV03sb_07_u:98: purīṣyāso agnaya iti | paśavyāso 'gnaya ityetatprāvaṇebhiḥ sajoṣasa iti prāyaṇarūpam
GV03sb_07_u:99: prāyaṇaṃ hyetadagneryadgārhapatyo juṣantāṃ yajñamadruho 'namīvā iṣo mahīriti
GV03sb_07_u:102: nānopadadhāti | ye nānākāmā ātmaṃstāṃstaddadhāti sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadātmānaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:103: karoti sūdadohasādhivadati prāṇo vai sūdadohāḥ prāṇeṇaivainametatsaṃtanoti
GV03sb_07_u:107: upadadhātīḍāmagne purudaṃsaṃ saniṃ goriti paśavo vā iḍā paśūnāmevāsmā
GV03sb_07_u:108: etāmāśiṣamāśāste śaśvattamaṃ havamānāya sādheti yajamāno vai havamānaḥ syānnaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:109: sūnustanayo vijāveti prajā vai sūnuragne sā te sumatirbhūtvasme ityāśiṣamāśāste
GV03sb_07_u:111: athottarām | ayaṃ te yonirṛtviyo yato jāto arocathā ityayaṃ te yonirṛtavyaḥ sanātano
GV03sb_07_u:112: yato jāto 'dīpyathā ityetattaṃ jānannagna ārohāthā no vardhayā rayimiti yathaiva
GV03sb_07_u:115: sakthyāvasyaite | te nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā
GV03sb_07_u:116: hīme sakthyau dve bhavato dve hīme sakthyau paścādupadadhāti paścāddhīme
GV03sb_07_u:117: sakthyāvagrābhyāṃ saṃspṛṣṭe bhavata evaṃ hīme sakthyāvagrābhyāṃ saṃspṛṣṭe
GV03sb_07_u:119: atha tenaiva punaḥ parītya | dakṣiṇata udaṅṅā sīnaḥ pūrvayoruttarāmagra upadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:120: cidasi tayā devatayāṅgirasvadṛddhruvā sīdetyatha dakṣiṇām paricidasi tayā
GV03sb_07_u:123: bāhū asyaite | te nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā hīmau
GV03sb_07_u:124: bāhū dve bhavato dvau hīmau bāhū pūrvārdha upadadhāti purastāddhīmau bāhū
GV03sb_07_u:125: agrābhyāṃ saṃspṛṣṭe bhavata evaṃ hīmau bāhū agrābhyāṃ saṃspṛṣṭau sa vā itīmā
GV03sb_07_u:129: mātrā tāvantamevainametaccinoti pañca kṛtvaḥ sādayati pañcacitiko 'gniḥ pañca
GV03sb_07_u:137: daśottarāstāsāmupari bandhurdve vāgre 'tha daśāthaikāmevaṃ hi citiṃ cinvanti
GV03sb_07_u:140: tā ubhayya ekaviṃśatiḥ sampadyante | dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastraya ime lokā
GV03sb_07_u:143: ekaviṃśatirveva pariśritaḥ | dvādaśa māsāḥ pañca 'rtavastraya ime lokā
GV03sb_07_u:146: 'nyasminpratiṣṭhitau tau vā etāvatra dvāvekaviṃśau sampādayatyatra hyevemau
GV03sb_07_u:149: atha purīṣaṃ nivapati | tasyopari bandhustaccātvālavelāyā āharatyagnireṣa
GV03sb_07_u:150: yaccātvālastatho hāsyaitadāgneyameva bhavati sā samambilā syāttasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:152: vyāmamātrī bhavati | vyāmamātro vai puruṣaḥ puruṣaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV03sb_07_u:153: prajāpatiragnirātmasammitāṃ tadyoniṃ karoti parimaṇḍalā bhavati parimaṇḍalā hi
GV03sb_07_u:154: yoniratho ayaṃ vai loko gārhapatyaḥ parimaṇḍala u vā ayaṃ lokaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:156: athainau saṃnivapati | saṃjñāmevābhyāmetatkaroti samitaṃ saṃkalpethāṃ saṃ vām
GV03sb_07_u:157: manāṃsi saṃ vratāgne tvam purīṣyo bhavataṃ naḥ samanasāviti
GV03sb_07_u:160: caturbhiḥ saṃnivapati | tadye catuṣpadāḥ paśavastairevābhyāmetatsaṃjñāṃ karotyatho
GV03sb_07_u:163: tāṃ na riktāmavekṣeta | nedriktāmavekṣā iti yadriktāmavekṣeta graseta hainam
GV03sb_07_u:165: athāsyāṃ sikatā āvapati | agneretadvaiśvānarasya reto yatsikatā
GV03sb_07_u:166: agnimevāsyāmetadvaiśvānaraṃ reto bhūtaṃ siñcati sā samambilā syāttasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:168: athaināṃ vimuñcati | apradāhāya yaddhi yuktaṃ na vimucyate pra taddahyata etadvā
GV03sb_07_u:169: etadyuktā reto 'bhārṣīdetamagniṃ tamatrājījanadathāparaṃ dhatte yoṣā vā ukhā
GV03sb_07_u:170: tasmādyadā yoṣā pūrvaṃ retaḥ prajanayatyathāparaṃ dhatte
GV03sb_07_u:172: māteva putram pṛthivī purīṣyamiti | māteva putram pṛthivī paśavyamityetadagniṃ
GV03sb_07_u:174: saṃvidānaḥ prajāpatirviśvakarmā vimuñcatviyṛtavo vai viśve devāstadenāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:178: athāsyām paya ānayati | etadvā etadreto dhatte 'tha payo dhatte yoṣā vā ukhā
GV03sb_07_u:179: tasmādyadā yoṣā reto dhatte 'tha payo dhatte 'dharāḥ sikatā bhavantyuttaram payo
GV03sb_07_u:180: 'dharaṃ hi reta uttaram payastanmadhya ānayati yathā tatprati
GV03sb_07_u:183: prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata | sa prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā sarvamājimitvā vyasraṃsata
GV03sb_07_u:189: te devā abruvan | na vā ito 'nyā pratiṣṭhāstīmameva pitaram prajāpatiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:192: te 'gnimabruvan | na vā ito 'nyā pratiṣṭhāsti tvayīmam pitaram prajāpatiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:193: saṃskaravāma saiva naḥ pratiṣṭhā bhaviṣyatīti kim me tato bhaviṣyatīti
GV03sb_07_u:195: te 'bruvan | annaṃ vā ayam prajāpatistvanmukhā etadannamadāma tvanmukhānāṃ na
GV03sb_07_u:196: eṣo 'nnamasaditi tatheti tasmāddevā agnimukhā annamadanti yasyai hi kasyai ca
GV03sb_07_u:197: devatāyai juhvatyagnāveva juhvatyagnimukhā hi taddevā annamakurvata
GV03sb_07_u:199: sa yo 'smātprāṇo madhyata udakrāmat | ayameva sa vāyuryo 'yam pavate 'tha
GV03sb_07_u:203: taṃ devā agnau prāvṛñjan | tadya enam pravṛktamagnirārohadya evāsmātsa prāṇo
GV03sb_07_u:204: madhyata udakrāmatsa evainaṃ sa āpadyata tamasminnadadhuratha
GV03sb_07_u:209: tasyāyameva lokaḥ pratiṣṭhā | atha yo 'smiṃloke 'gniḥ so 'syāvāṅ prāṇo
GV03sb_07_u:211: dyaurevāsya śiraḥ sūryācandramasau cakṣuṣī yaccakṣuradhyaśeta sa
GV03sb_07_u:214: tadeṣā vai sā pratiṣṭhā | yāṃ taddevāḥ samaskurvantsaiveyamadyāpi pratiṣṭhā so
GV03sb_07_u:217: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatirvyasraṃsata | ayameva sa yo 'yamagniścīyata tadyadeṣokhā riktā
GV03sb_07_u:218: śete purā pravarjanādyathaiva tatprajāpatirutkrānte prāṇa utkrānte vīrye srute 'nne
GV03sb_07_u:221: tāmagnau pravṛṇakti | yathaivainamado devāḥ prāvṛñjaṃstadya enām
GV03sb_07_u:222: pravṛktāmagnirārohati ya evāsmātsa prāṇo madhyata udakrāmatsa evainaṃ sa
GV03sb_07_u:227: tā vai sāyam prātarādadhāti | ahnaśca hi tadrātreścānnamasravattānyetāni
GV03sb_07_u:228: sarvasminneva saṃvatsare syuḥ saṃvatsaro hi sa
GV03sb_07_u:232: vāmakakṣāyaṇo nedimam pitaram prajāpatiṃ vicidyamānam paśyānīti taṃ saṃvatsare
GV03sb_07_u:233: sarvaṃ kṛtsnaṃ saṃskatyordhvamucrayati yathaivainamado devā udaśrayan
GV03sb_07_u:235: tasya gārhapatya evāyaṃ lokaḥ | atha yo gārhapatye 'gnirya evāyamasmiṃloke 'gniḥ so
GV03sb_07_u:236: 'sya so 'tha yadantarāhavanīyaṃ ca gārhapatyaṃ ca tadantarikṣamatha ya āgnīdhrīye
GV03sb_07_u:237: 'gnirya evāyamantarikṣe vāyuḥ so 'sya sa āhavanīya eva dyauratha ya āhavanīye
GV03sb_07_u:240: tasya śira evāhavanīyaḥ | atha ya āhavanīye 'gnirya evāyaṃ śīrṣanprāṇaḥ so 'sya sa
GV03sb_07_u:242: dakṣiṇaṃ śrotraṃ dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣa uttaraṃ śrotramuttaraḥ pakṣaḥ prāṇo
GV03sb_07_u:243: madhyamātmā vākpucam pratiṣṭhā tadyatprāṇā vācānnaṃ jagdhvā pratitiṣṭhanti
GV03sb_07_u:246: atha yadantarāhavanīyaṃ ca gārhapatyaṃ ca | sa ātmātha ya āgnīdhrīye 'gnirya
GV03sb_07_u:247: evāyamantarātmanprāṇaḥ so 'sya sa pratiṣṭhaivāsya gārhapatyo 'tha yo gārhapatye
GV03sb_07_u:250: taṃ haike tricitaṃ cinvanti | trayo vā ime vāñcaḥ prāṇā iti na tathā kuryādati te
GV03sb_07_u:252: kurvantyekaṃ hyevaitadrūpaṃ yonireva prajātireva yadete 'vāñcaḥ prāṇā yaddhi
GV03sb_07_u:255: athātaḥ sampadeva | ekaviṃśatiriṣṭakā nava yajūṃṣi tattriṃśatsādanaṃ ca sūdadohāśca
GV03sb_07_u:258: ekaviṃśatirveva pariṣritaḥ | yajurdvāviṃśaṃ vyudūhanasya yajurūṣāśca yajuśca
GV03sb_07_u:259: sikatāśca yajuśca purīṣaṃ ca yajuśca caturbhiḥ saṃnivapati vimuñcati pañcamena
GV03sb_07_u:262: athaite dve yajuṣī | so anuṣṭubeva vāgvā anuṣṭuptadyadidaṃ dvayaṃ vāco rūpaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:263: daivaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ coccaiśca śanaiśca tadete dve
GV03sb_07_u:265: tā vā etāstisro 'nuṣṭubhaḥ | cita eṣa gārhapatyastadyadetā atra tisro 'nuṣṭubhaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:266: sampādayantyatra hyeveme tadā sarve lokā bhavanti tato 'nyatarāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:267: dvātriṃśadakṣarāmanuṣṭubhamāhavanīyaṃ haranti sa āhavanīyaḥ sā dyaustaciro
GV03sb_07_u:268: 'thehānyatarā pariśiṣyate sa gārhapatyaḥ sā pratiṣṭhā sa u ayaṃ lokaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:270: atha ye ete dve yajuṣī | etattadyadantarāhavanīyaṃ ca gārhapatyaṃ ca tadantarikṣaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:271: sa ātmā tadyatte dve bhavatastasmādetattanīyo yadantarāhavanīyaṃ ca gārhapatyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:274: saiṣā tredhāvihitā vāganṛṣṭup | tāmeṣo 'gniḥ prāṇo bhūtvānusaṃcarati ya āhavanīye
GV03sb_07_u:275: 'gniḥ sa prāṇaḥ so 'sāvādityo 'tha ya āgnīdhrīye 'gniḥ sa vyānaḥ sa u ayaṃ vāyuryo
GV03sb_07_u:276: 'yam pavate 'tha yo gārhapatye 'gniḥ sa udānaḥ sa u ayaṃ yo 'yamasmiṃloke
GV03sb_07_u:277: 'gnirevaṃviddha vāva sarvāṃ vācaṃ sarvam prāṇaṃ sarvamātmānaṃ saṃskurute
GV03sb_07_u:279: saiṣā bṛhatyeva | ye vai dve dvātriṃśatau dvātriṃśadeva tadathaite dve yajuṣī
GV03sb_07_u:280: taccatustriṃśadagnireva pañcatriṃśo nākṣarāccando vyetyekasmānna dvābhyāṃ sa u
GV03sb_07_u:281: dvyakṣarastatṣaṭtriṃśatṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarā bṛhatī bṛhatīṃ vā eṣa saṃcito
GV03sb_07_u:282: 'bhisampadyate yādṛgvai yonau retaḥ sicyate tādṛgjāyate tadyadetāmatra bṛhatīṃ
GV03sb_07_u:285: tadāhuḥ | yadayaṃ loko gārhapatyo 'ntarikṣaṃ dhiṣṇyā dyaurāhavanīyo
GV03sb_07_u:288: āsīttadantarikṣamabhavadīkṣaṃ haitannāma tataḥ purāntarā vā idamīkṣamabhūditi
GV03sb_07_u:293: athāto nairṛtīrharanti | etadvai devā gārhapatyaṃ citvā samārohannayaṃ vai loko
GV03sb_07_u:294: gārhapatya imameva taṃ lokaṃ saṃskṛtya samārohaṃste tama evānatidṛśyamapaśyan
GV03sb_07_u:296: te 'bruvan | upa tajjānīta yathedaṃ tamaḥ pāpmānamapahanāmahā iti te
GV03sb_07_u:300: te cetayamānāḥ | etā iṣṭakā apaśyannairṛtīstā upādadhata tābhistattamaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:301: pāpmānamapāghnata pāpmā vai nirṛtistadyadetābhiḥ pāpmānaṃ nirṛtima pāghnata
GV03sb_07_u:304: tadvā etatkriyate | yaddevā akurvannidaṃ nu tattama sa pāpmā devairevāpahato

GV03sb_07_u:541: trīnkṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe ca ninayati | trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_07_u:550: dvādaśodacamasānkṛṣṭe ninayati | dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_07_u:553: sa vai kṛṣṭe ninayati | prāṇeṣu tadapo dadhāti sa yatkṛṣṭa eva ninayennākṛṣṭe
GV03sb_07_u:554: prāṇeṣvevāpaḥ syurnetarasminnātmannatha yadakṛṣṭa eva ninayenna kṛṣṭa
GV03sb_07_u:555: ātmannevāpaḥ syurna prāṇeṣu kṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe ca ninayati tasmādimā ubhayatrāpaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:558: trīnkṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe ca ninayati | trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā

GV03sb_07_u:571: vai diśaḥ sarvābhya evāsminnetaddigbhyo 'nnaṃ dadhātyanuṣṭubbhirvapati vāgvā
GV03sb_07_u:577: dvādaśabhirṛgbhiḥ kṛṣṭe vapati | dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_07_u:580: sa vai kṛṣṭe vapati | tasmātkṛṣṭe 'nnam pacyate yatkṛṣṭa eva vapennākṛṣṭe kṛṣṭa
GV03sb_07_u:581: evānnam pacyeta nākṛṣṭe 'tha yadakṛṣṭa eva vapenna kṛṣṭe 'kṛṣṭa evānnam
GV03sb_07_u:582: pacyeta na kṛṣṭe kṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe ca vapati tasmātkṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe cānnam pacyate
GV03sb_07_u:584: tisṛbhiḥ kṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe ca vapati | trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_07_u:587: yadveva sarvauṣadhaṃ vapati | etadvā ena devāḥ saṃskariṣyantaḥ purastātsarveṇa
GV03sb_07_u:597: dvādaśabhirṛgbhiḥ kṛṣṭe vapati | dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_07_u:600: sa vai kṛṣṭe vapati | prāṇāṃstadbhiṣajyati sa yatkṛṣṭa eva vapennākṛṣṭe prāṇāneva
GV03sb_07_u:601: bhiṣajyennetaramātmānamatha yadakṛṣṭa eva vapenna kṛṣṭa ātmānameva
GV03sb_07_u:602: bhiṣajyenna prāṇānkṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe ca vapati prāṇāṃśca tadātmānaṃ ca bhiṣajyati
GV03sb_07_u:604: tisṛbhiḥ kṛṣṭe cākṛṣṭe ca vapati | trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_07_u:610: yā oṣadhīḥ pūrvā jātāḥ | devebhyastriyugam puretyṛtavo vai devāstebhya etāstrim
GV03sb_07_u:611: purā jāyante vasantā prāvṛṣi śaradi manai nubabhrūṇāmahamiti somo vai babhruḥ
GV03sb_07_u:612: saumyā oṣadhaya oṣadhaḥ puruṣaḥ śataṃ dhāmānīti yadidaṃ śatāyuḥ śatārghaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:613: śatavīya etāni hāsya tāni śataṃ dhāmāni sapta ceti ya eveme sapta
GV03sb_07_u:616: śataṃ vo amba dhāmāni | sahasramuta vo ruha iti yadidaṃ śatadhā ca sahasradhā ca
GV03sb_07_u:617: virūḍhā adhā śatakratvo yūyamimam me agadaṃ kṛteti yamimam bhiṣajyāmītyetat
GV03sb_07_u:619: tā etā ekavyākhyānāḥ | etamevābhi yathaitameva bhiṣajyedetam pārayettā anuṣṭubho
GV03sb_07_u:620: bhavanti vāgvā anuṣṭubvāgu sarvam bheṣajaṃ sarveṇaivainametadbheṣajena
GV03sb_07_u:623: athāto niruktāniruktānāmeva | yajuṣā dvāvanaḍvāhau yunakti tūṣṇīmitarānyajuṣā
GV03sb_07_u:624: catasraḥ kṛṣati tūṣṇīmitarā stūṣṇīṃ darbhastambamupadadhāti yajuṣābhijuhoti
GV03sb_07_u:628: parimitaścāparimitaśca tadyadyajuṣā karoti yadevāsya niruktam parimitaṃ rūpaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:629: tadasya tena saṃskarotyaśca yattūṣṇīṃ yadevāsyāniruktamaparimitaṃ rūpaṃ tadasya
GV03sb_07_u:630: tena saṃstaroti sa ha vā etaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saṃskaroti ya evaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:631: vidvānetadevaṃ karoti bāhyāni rūpāṇi niruktāni bhavantyantarāṇyaniruktāni puśureṣa
GV03sb_07_u:634: cito gārhapatyo bhavati | acita āhavanīyo 'tha rājānaṃ krīṇātyayaṃ vai loko
GV03sb_07_u:635: gārhapatyo dyaurāhavanīyo 'tha yo 'yaṃ vāyuḥ pavata eṣa soma etaṃ tadimau
GV03sb_07_u:636: lokāvantareṇa dadhāti tasmādeṣa imau lokāvantareṇa pavate
GV03sb_07_u:638: yadveva cite gārhapatye | acita āhavanīye 'tha rājānaṃ krīṇātyātmā vā agniḥ prāṇaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:639: soma ātmaṃstatprāṇam madhyato dadhāti tasmādayamātmanprāṇo madhyataḥ
GV03sb_07_u:641: yadveva cite gārhapatye | acita āhavanīye 'tha rājānaṃ krīṇātyātmā vā agnī rasaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:644: rājānaṃ krītvā paryuhya | athāsmā ātithyaṃ havirnirvapati tasya haviṣkṛtā vācaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:645: visṛjate 'tha vā etadvyatiṣajatyadhvarakarma cāgnikarma ca karmaṇaḥ samānatāyai
GV03sb_07_u:648: yadveva vyatiṣajati | ātmā vā agniḥ prāṇo 'dhvara ātmaṃstatprāṇam madhyato
GV03sb_07_u:651: yadveva vyatiṣajati | ātmā vā agnī raso 'dhvara ātmānaṃ tadrasenānuṣajati
GV03sb_07_u:654: taddhaike | ubhayatraiva palāśaśākhayā vyudūhantyubhayatra vai cinotīti na tathā
GV03sb_07_u:655: kuryādavasyati vāva gārhapatyenordhva evāhavanīyena rohati tasmāttathā na kuryāt
GV03sb_07_u:657: atha gārhapatya evoṣānnivapati | nāhavanīye 'yaṃ vai loko gārhapatyaḥ paśava ūṣā
GV03sb_07_u:660: athāhavanīya eva puṣkaraparṇamupadadhāti | na gārhapatya āpo vai puṣkaraparṇaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:661: dyaurāhavanīyo divi tadapo dadhātyubhayatra sikatā nivapati reto vai sikatā
GV03sb_07_u:662: ubhayatra vai vikriyate tasmādretaso 'dhi vikriyātā iti
GV03sb_07_u:664: tā nānā mantrābhyāṃ nivapati | manuṣyaloko vai gārhapatyo devaloka āhavanīyo
GV03sb_07_u:665: nāno vā etadyaddaivaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ ca drāghīyasā mantreṇāhavanīye nivapati
GV03sb_07_u:666: hrasīyasā gārhapatye drāghīyo hi devāyuṣaṃ hrasīyo manuṣyāyuṣaṃ sa pūrvāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:667: pariśridbhyo gārhapatye sikatā nivapati reto vai sikatā asmādretaso 'dīmā vikriyāntā
GV03sb_07_u:670: tadāhuḥ | yadyoniḥ pariśrito retaḥ sikatā atha pūrvāḥ pariśridbhyo gārhapatye sikatā
GV03sb_07_u:673: bhavatyathāhavanīye pariśrito 'bhimantrayate tasyokto bandhuratha sikatā nivapati
GV03sb_07_u:674: reto vai sikatā etayo asyaitadyonyā reto 'parāsiktam parigṛhītam bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:676: athāhavanīya evāpyānavatībhyāmabhimṛśati | na gārhapatye 'yaṃ vai loko
GV03sb_07_u:677: gārhapatyaḥ svargo loka āhavanīyo 'ddho vā ayamasmiṃloke jāto yajamānaḥ svarga
GV03sb_07_u:681: atha logeṣṭakā upadadhāti | ime vai lokā eṣo 'gnirdiśo logeṣṭakā eṣu tallokeṣu
GV03sb_07_u:682: diśo dadhāti tasmādimā eṣu lokeṣu diśaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:684: bāhyenāgnimāharati | āptā vā asya tā diśo yā eṣu lokeṣvatha yā imāṃlokānpareṇa
GV03sb_07_u:687: bahirvederiyaṃ vai vediḥ | āptā vā asya tā diśo yā asyāmatha yā imām pareṇa diśastā
GV03sb_07_u:690: yadveva logeṣṭakā upadadhāti | prajāpatervisrastasya sarvā diśo raso 'nu vyakṣaratta
GV03sb_07_u:694: bāhyenāgnimāharati | āpto vā asya sa raso ya eṣu lokeṣvatha ya imāṃlokānparāṅraso
GV03sb_07_u:697: bahirvederiyaṃ vai vediḥ | āpto vā asya sa raso yo 'syāmatha ya imām parāṅraso
GV03sb_07_u:700: sphyenāharati | vajro vai sphyo vīryaṃ vai vajro vittiriyaṃ vīryeṇa vai vittiṃ vindate
GV03sb_07_u:702: sa purastādāharati | mā mā hiṃsījjanitā yaḥ pṛthivyā iti prajāpatirvai pṛthivyai janitā
GV03sb_07_u:703: mā mā hiṃsītprajāpatirityetadyo vā divaṃ satyadharmā vyānaḍiti yo vā divaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:704: satyadharmāsṛjatetyetadyaścāpaścandrāḥ prathamo jajāneti manuṣyā vā āpaścandrā
GV03sb_07_u:705: yo manuṣyānprathamo 'sṛjatetyetatkasmai devāya haviṣā vidhemeti prajāpatirvai
GV03sb_07_u:706: kastasmai haviṣā vidhemetyetattāmāhṛtyāntareṇa pariśrita ātmannupadadhāti sa yaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:710: atha dakṣiṇataḥ | abhyāvartasva pṛthivi yajñena payasā saheti yathaiva yajustathā
GV03sb_07_u:711: bandhurvapāṃ te agniriṣito arohaditi yadvai kiṃ cāsyāṃ sāsyai vapā tāmagniriṣita
GV03sb_07_u:712: upādīpto rohati tāmāhṛtyāntareṇa pakṣasaṃdhimātmannupadadhāti sa yo dakṣiṇāyāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:715: atha paścāt | agne yatte śukraṃ yaccandraṃ yatpūtaṃ yacca yajñiyamitīyaṃ vā
GV03sb_07_u:716: agnirasyai tadāha taddevebhyo bharāmasīti tadasmai daivāya karmaṇe harāma
GV03sb_07_u:717: ityetattāmāhṛtyāntareṇa pucasaṃdhimātmannupadadhāti sa yaḥ pratīcyāṃ diśi raso
GV03sb_07_u:722: yonimiti satyaṃ vā ṛtaṃ satyasya yonimityetanmahiṣasya dhārāmityagnirvai mahiṣaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:723: sa hīdaṃ jāto mahāntsarvamaiṣṇādā mā goṣu viśatvā tanūṣvityātmā vai tanūrā mā
GV03sb_07_u:724: goṣu cātmani ca viśatvityetajjahāmi sedimanirāmamīvāmiti sikatāḥ pradhvaṃsayati
GV03sb_07_u:725: tadyaiva sediryānirā yāmīvā tāmetasyāṃ diśi dadhāti tasmādetasyāṃ diśi prajā
GV03sb_07_u:726: aśanāyukāstāmāhṛtyāntareṇa pakṣasaṃdhimātmannupadadhāti sa ya udīcyāṃ diśi raso
GV03sb_07_u:729: tā etā diśaḥ | tāḥ sakvata upadadhāti sarvatastaddiśo dadhāti tasmātsarvato diśaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:730: sarvataḥ samīcīḥ sarvatastatsamīcīrdiśo dadhāti tasmātsarvataḥ samīcyo diśastā
GV03sb_07_u:731: nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā hi
GV03sb_07_u:732: diśastiṣṭhannupadadhāti tiṣṭhantīva hi diśo 'tho tiṣṭhanvai vīryavattaraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:734: tā etā yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāḥ | tā ātmannaivopadadhāti na pakṣapuceṣvātmanhyeva
GV03sb_07_u:737: tadāhuḥ | kathamasyaitāḥ pakvāḥ śṛtā upahitā bhavantīti raso vā etāḥ svayaṃśṛta u vai
GV03sb_07_u:738: raso 'tho yadvai kiṃ caitamagniṃ vaiśvānaramupanigacati tata eva tatpakvaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:741: athottaravediṃ nivapati | iyaṃ vai vedirdyairuttaravedirdiśo logeṣṭakāstadyadantareṇa
GV03sb_07_u:742: vediṃ cottaravediṃ ca logeṣṭakā upadadhātīmau tallokāvantareṇa diśo dadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:743: tasmādimau lokāvantareṇa diśastāṃ yugamātrīṃ vā sarvataḥ karoti catvāriṃśatpadāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:744: vā yatarathā kāmayetātha sikatā nivapati tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:746: tā uttaravedau nivapati | yonirvā uttaravediryonau tadretaḥ siñcati yadvai yonau retaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:747: sicyate tatprajaniṣṇu bhavati tābhiḥ sarvamātmānam pracādayati
GV03sb_07_u:750: agne tava śravo vaya iti | dhūmo vā asya śravo vayaḥ sa hyenamamuṣmiṃloke
GV03sb_07_u:751: śrāvayati mahi bhrājante arcayo vibhāvasāveti mahato bhrājante 'rcayaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:752: prabhūvasavityetadbṛhadbhāno śavasā vājamukthyamiti bala vai śavo bṛhadbhāno
GV03sb_07_u:753: valenānnamukthyamityetaddadhāsi dāśuṣe kava iti yajamāno vai dāśvāndadhāsi
GV03sb_07_u:756: pāvakavarcāḥ śukravarcā iti | pavakavarcā hyeṣa śukravarcā anūnavarcā udiyarṣi
GV03sb_07_u:757: bhānunetyanūnavarcā uddīpyase bhānunetyetatputro mātarā vicarannupāvasīti putro
GV03sb_07_u:758: hyeṣa mātarā vicarannupāvati pṛṇakṣi rodasī ubhe itīme vai dyāvāpṛthivī rodasī te
GV03sb_07_u:761: ūrjo napājjātavedaḥ suśastibhiriti | ūrjo napājjātavedaḥ suṣṭutibhirityetanmandasva
GV03sb_07_u:762: dhītibhirhita iti dīpyasva dhītibhirhita ityetattve iṣaḥ saṃdadhurbhūrivarvasa iti tve
GV03sb_07_u:763: iṣaḥ saṃdadhurbahuvarpasa ityetaccitrotayo vāmajātā iti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:765: irajyannagne prathayasva jantubhiriti | manuṣyā vai jantavo dīpyamāno 'gne
GV03sb_07_u:767: dadhadamartyetatsadarśatasya vapuśo virājasīti darśatasya hyeṣa vapuṣo virājati
GV03sb_07_u:768: pṛṇakṣi sānasiṃ kratumiti pṛṇakṣi sanātanaṃ kratumityetat
GV03sb_07_u:770: iṣkartāramadhvarasya pracetasamiti | adhvaro vai yajñaḥ prakalpayitāraṃ yajñasya
GV03sb_07_u:771: pracetasamityetatkṣayantaṃ rādhaso maha iti kṣayantaṃ rādhasi mahatītyetadrātiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:772: vāmasya subhagām mahīmiṣamiti rātiṃ vāmasya subhagām
GV03sb_07_u:773: mahatīmiṣamityetaddadhāsi sānasiṃ rayimiti dadhāsi sanātanaṃ rayimityetat
GV03sb_07_u:776: viśvadarśato hyeṣo 'gniṃ sumnāya dadhire puro janā iti yajño vai sumnaṃ yajñāya vā
GV03sb_07_u:777: etam puro dadhate śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā daivyam mānuṣā
GV03sb_07_u:778: yugetyāśṛṇvantaṃ saprathastamaṃ tvā girā devam manuṣyā havāmaha ityetat
GV03sb_07_u:780: sa eṣo 'gnireva vaiśvānaraḥ | etatṣaḍṛcamārambhāyaivemāḥ sikatā nyupyante
GV03sb_07_u:781: 'gnimevāsminnetadvaiśvānaraṃ reto bhūtaṃ śiñcati ṣaḍṛcena ṣaḍṛtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:784: tadāhuḥ | yadretaḥ sikatā ucyante kimāsāṃ reto rūpamiti śuklā iti brūyācuklaṃ hi reto
GV03sb_07_u:787: tadāhuḥ | yadārdraṃ retaḥ śuṣkāḥ sikatā nivapati kathamasyaitā ārdrā retorūpam
GV03sb_07_u:788: bhavantīti raso vai candāṃsyārdra u vai rasastadyadenāścandobhirnivapatyevamu
GV03sb_07_u:791: tadāhuḥ | kathamasyaitā ahorātrābhyāmupahitā bhavantīti dve vā ahorātre śuklaṃ ca
GV03sb_07_u:792: kṛṣṇaṃ ca dva sikate śuklā ca kṛṣṇā caivamu hāsyaitā ahorātrābhyāmupahitā
GV03sb_07_u:795: tadāhuḥ | kathamasyaitā ahorātraiḥ sampannā anyūnā anatiriktā upahitā
GV03sb_07_u:796: bhavantītyanantāni vā ahorātrāṇyanantāḥ sikatā evamu hāsyaitā ahorātraiḥ sampannā
GV03sb_07_u:797: anyūnā anatiriktā upahitā bhavantyatha kasmātsamudriyaṃ canda ityananto vai
GV03sb_07_u:800: tadāhuḥ | kathamasyaitāḥ pṛthaṅnānā yajurbhirupahitā bhavantīti mano vai
GV03sb_07_u:801: yajustadidam mano yajuḥ sarvāḥ sikatā anuvibhavatyevamu hāsyaitāḥ pṛthaṅnānā
GV03sb_07_u:804: tadāhuḥ | kathamasyaitāḥ sarvaiścandobhirupahitā bhavantīti yadevainā etena
GV03sb_07_u:805: ṣaḍṛcena nivapati yāvanti hi saptānāṃ candasāmakṣarāṇi tāvantyetasya
GV03sb_07_u:808: yadveva sikatā nivapati | prajāpatireṣo 'gniḥ sarvamu brahma
GV03sb_07_u:809: prajāpatistaddhaitadbrahmaṇa utsanne yatsikatā atha yadanutsannamidaṃ tadyo
GV03sb_07_u:811: tadasminnetatpratidadhāti tā asaṃkhyātā aparimitā nivapati ko hi tadveda
GV03sb_07_u:812: yāvattadbrahmaṇa utsannaṃ sa ha vā etaṃ sarvaṃ kṛtsnam prajāpatiṃ saṃskaroti ya
GV03sb_07_u:815: tadāhuḥ | kaitāsāmasaṃkhyātānāṃ saṃkhyeti dve iti brūyāddve hi sikate śuklā ca kṛṣṇā
GV03sb_07_u:816: cātho sapta viṃśatiśatānīti brūyādetāvanti hi saṃvatsarasyāhorātrāṇyatho dve
GV03sb_07_u:817: dvāpañcāśe śate ityetāvanti hyetasya ṣaḍṛcasyākṣarāṇyatho pañcaviṃśatiriti
GV03sb_07_u:820: tā etā yajuṣmatya iṣṭakāḥ | tā ātmannevopadadhāti na pakṣapuceṣvātmanhyeva
GV03sb_07_u:821: yajuṣmatya iṣṭakā upadhīyante na pakṣapuceṣu na sādayati nedretaḥ prajātiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:825: tasmādyonau retaḥ siktamāpyāyate saumībhyām prāṇo vai somaḥ prāṇaṃ tadretasi
GV03sb_07_u:826: dadhāti tasmādretaḥ siktam prāṇamabhisambhavati pūyeddha yadṛte
GV03sb_07_u:827: prāṇātsambhavedeṣo haivātra sūdadohāḥ prāṇo vai somaḥ sūdadohāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:829: āpyāyasva sametu te | viśvataḥ soma vṛṣṇyamiti reto vai vṛṣṇyamāpyāyasva sametu te
GV03sb_07_u:830: sarvataḥ soma reta ityetadbhavā vājasya saṃgatha ityanne vai vājo bhavānnasya
GV03sb_07_u:831: saṃgatha ityetatsaṃ te payāṃsi samu yanti vājā iti raso vai payo 'nne vājāḥ saṃ te rasāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:832: samu yantvannānītyetatsaṃ vṛṣṇyabhimātiṣāha iti saṃ retāṃsi pāpmasaha
GV03sb_07_u:833: ityetadāpyāyamāno amṛtāya someti prajātyāṃ tadamṛtaṃ dadhāti tasmātprajātiramṛtā
GV03sb_07_u:834: divi śravāṃsyuttamāni dhiṣveti candramā vā asya divi śrava uttamaṃ sa
GV03sb_07_u:835: hyenamamuṣmiṃloke śrāvayati dvābhyāmāpyāyayati gāyatryā ca triṣṭubhā ca
GV03sb_07_u:838: athātāḥ sampadeva | catasro logeṣṭakā upadadhāti ṣaḍṛcena nivapati
GV03sb_07_u:839: dvābhyāmāpyāyayati taddvādaśa dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV03sb_07_u:843: pravargyopasadbhyām pracarati pravargyopasadbhyām pracaryāthaitāṃ carmaṇi citiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:844: samavaśamayanti tadyaccarmaṇi carma vai rūpaṃ rūpāṇāmupāptyai lomato loma vai
GV03sb_07_u:845: rūpaṃ rūpāṇāmupāptyai rohite rohite ha sarvāṇi rūpāṇi sarveṣāṃ rūpāṇāmupāptyā
GV03sb_07_u:848: tadagreṇa gārhapatyam | antarvedyuttaraloma prācīnagnīvamupastṛṇāti tadetāṃ citiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:850: karotyājyena taddhi śuddham medhyamatho anabhyārohāya na hi kiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:851: canānyaddhavirājyena prokṣanti tūṣṇīmaniruktaṃ vai tadyattūṣṇīṃ sarvaṃ vā
GV03sb_07_u:852: aniruktaṃ sarveṇaivaitacuddham medhyaṃ karotyatho anabhyārohāya na hi kiṃ
GV03sb_07_u:855: yadveva prokṣati | havirvā etattadetadabhighārayati yadvai havirabhyaktaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:856: yadabhighāritaṃ tajjuṣṭaṃ tanmedhyamājyenājyena hi havirabhighārayanti tūṣṇīṃ
GV03sb_07_u:857: tūṣṇīṃ hi havirabhighārayanti darbhaiste hi śuddhā medhyā agrairagraṃ hi devānām
GV03sb_07_u:859: tadāhuḥ | yatprathamāmeva citim prokṣati kathamasyaiṣa sarvo 'gniḥ prokṣito
GV03sb_07_u:860: bhavati kathaṃ carmaṇi praṇītaḥ kathamaśvapraṇīta iti yadevātra sarvāsāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:861: citīnāmiṣṭakāḥ prokṣatyevamu hāsyaiṣa sarvo 'gniḥ prokṣito bhavatyevaṃ carmaṇi
GV03sb_07_u:865: yajñaṃ taṃsyamānānrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā ajighāṃsanna yakṣyadhve na yajñaṃ taṃsyadhva
GV03sb_07_u:866: iti tebhya etānagnīnetā iṣṭakā vajrānkṣurapavīnkṛtvā prāharaṃstairenānastṛṇvata
GV03sb_07_u:869: tadvā etatkriyate | yaddevā akurvannidaṃ nu tāni rakṣāṃsi devairevopahatāni
GV03sb_07_u:870: yattvetatkaroti yaddevā akurvaṃstatkaravāṇītyatho yadeva rakṣo yaḥ pāpmā tebhya
GV03sb_07_u:874: tadyadagnibhya iti | bahavo hyete 'gnayo yadetāścitayo 'tha yatprahriyamāṇebhya iti
GV03sb_07_u:877: taddhaike 'nvāhuḥ | purīṣyāso agnayaḥ prāvaṇabhiḥ sajoṣasa iti prāyaṇarūpaṃ na
GV03sb_07_u:878: tathā kuryādāgneyīreva gāyatrīḥ kāmavatīranubrūyādā te vatso mano yamattubhyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:883: tisrasrivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvataivainametadreto bhūtaṃ siñcati tāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:884: sapta sampadyante saha triranūktābhyāṃ saptacitiko 'gniḥ sapta 'rtavaḥ saṃvatsaraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:885: saṃvatsaro 'gniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā tāvattadbhavatyupāṃśvanvāha reto vā atra
GV03sb_07_u:886: yajña upāṃśu vai retaḥ sicyate paścādanubruvannanveti candobhirevaitadyajñam
GV03sb_07_u:889: athāśvaṃ śuklam purastānnayanti | etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai na iha rakṣāṃsi
GV03sb_07_u:890: nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etaṃ vajramapaśyannamumevādityamasau vā āditya eṣo
GV03sb_07_u:891: 'śvasta etena vajreṇa purastādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭre svasti
GV03sb_07_u:892: samāśnuvata tathaivaitadyajamāna etena vajreṇa purastādrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_07_u:893: apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭre svasti samaśnuta āgaghantyagniṃ dakṣiṇataḥ pucasya
GV03sb_07_u:896: tamuttarādhenāgneḥ | antareṇa pariśritaḥ prāñcaṃ nayanti tatprācyai diśaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:897: pāpmānamapahanti taṃ dakṣiṇā taddakṣiṇāyai diśaḥ pāpmānamapahanti tam
GV03sb_07_u:898: pratyañcaṃ tatpratīcyai diśaḥ pāpmānamapahanti tamudañcaṃ tadudīcyai diśaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:902: tam pratyañcaṃ yantam | etāṃ citimavaghrāpayatyasau vā āditya eṣo 'śva imā u
GV03sb_07_u:903: sarvāḥ prajā yā imā iṣṭakāstadyadavaghrādayatyasāveva tadāditya imāḥ prajā
GV03sb_07_u:904: abhijighrati tasmādu haitatsarvo 'smīti manyate prajāpatervīryeṇa tadyatpratyañcaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:905: yantamavaghrāpayati pratyaṅ hyevaiṣa yannimāḥ sarvāḥ prajā abhijighrati
GV03sb_07_u:907: yadvevāvaghrāpayati | asau vā āditya eṣo 'śva ima u lokā etāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:912: prajāpatimabruvaṃstvamimamanvica sa tubhyaṃ svāya pitra āvirbhaviṣyatīti
GV03sb_07_u:913: tamaśvaḥ śuklo bhūtvānvaicattamadbhya upodāsṛptam puṣkaraparṇe viveda
GV03sb_07_u:914: tamabhyavekṣāṃ cakre sa hainamuduvoṣa tasmāduvoṣa tasmādaśvaḥ śukla
GV03sb_07_u:915: uduṣṭamukha ivāthā ha durakṣo bhāvukastamu vā ṛtveva hiṃsitveva mete taṃ
GV03sb_07_u:918: sa hovāca | yastvānena rūpeṇānvicādvindādeva tvā sa iti sa yo hainametena
GV03sb_07_u:919: rūpeṇānvicati vindati hainaṃ vittvā haivainaṃ cinute
GV03sb_07_u:921: sa śuklaḥ syāt | taddhyetasya rūpaṃ ya eṣa tapati yadi śuklaṃ na vindedapyaśuklaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:922: syādaśvastveva syādyadyaśvaṃ na vindedapyanaḍvāneva syādāgneyo vā
GV03sb_07_u:925: athāto 'dhirohaṇasyaiva | taṃ haike purastātpratyañcamadhirohanti paścādvā prāñcaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:926: na tathā kuryātpaśureṣa yadagniryo vai paśum purastātpratyañcamadhirohati
GV03sb_07_u:927: viṣāṇābhyāṃ taṃ hantyatha yaḥ paścātprāñcam padbhyāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:928: tamātmanevainamārohedyaṃ vā ātmanā paśumārohanti sa pārayati sa na
GV03sb_07_u:929: hinastyuttarato yaṃ hi kaṃ ca paśumārohantyuttarata
GV03sb_07_u:931: ātmannagniṃ gṛhītvā satyaṃ sāma gāyati puṣkaraparṇamupadadhāti tasyātaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:933: athaitaṃ sāye bhūte 'śvam pariṇayanti | etadva devā abibhayuryadvai na imamiha
GV03sb_07_u:934: rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti tasmā etaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:938: taṃ vā upāstamayamādityasya pariṇayati | eṣa vā asya pratyakṣaṃ divā goptā bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:939: rātrisācayānyu vai rakṣāṃsi rātryā evāsmā etaṃ vajramabhigoptāraṃ karoti sarvataḥ
GV03sb_07_u:940: pariṇayati sarvata evāsmā etaṃ vajramabhigoptāraṃ karoti triṣkṛtvaḥ pariṇayati
GV03sb_07_u:941: trivṛtamevāsmā etaṃ vajramabhigoptāraṃ karotyathainamudañcam prāñcam prasṛjati
GV03sb_07_u:942: tasyokto bandhuratha sa punarvipalyayate tasyopari bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:944: ātmannagniṃ gṛhṇīte ceṣyan | ātmano vā etamadhijanayati yādṛśādva jāyate tādṛṅṅeva
GV03sb_07_u:950: sa gṛhṇāti | mayi gṛhṇāmyagre agnimiti tadātmannevāgre 'gniṃ gṛhṇāti rāyaspoṣāya
GV03sb_07_u:951: suprajāstvāya suvīryāyeti tadu sarvā āśiṣa ātmangṛhṇīte māmu devatāḥ sacantāmiti
GV03sb_07_u:953: tatsarvamātmangṛhṇīte sa vai tiṣṭhannātmannagniṃ gṛhītvānūpaviśya cinoti
GV03sb_07_u:956: atha satyaṃ sāma gāyati | etadvai devā abruvantsatyamasya mukhaṃ karavāma te
GV03sb_07_u:957: satyam bhaviṣyāmaḥ satyaṃ no 'nuvartsyati satyo naḥ sa kāmo bhaviṣyati yatkāmā
GV03sb_07_u:960: ta etatsatyaṃ sāma purastādagāyan | tadasya satyam mukhamakurvaṃste
GV03sb_07_u:964: tathaivaitadyajamānaḥ | yatsatyaṃ sāma purastādgāyati tadasya satyam mukhaṃ karoti
GV03sb_07_u:965: sa satyam bhavati satyamenamanuvartate satyo 'sya sa kāmo bhavati yatkāma
GV03sb_07_u:968: tadyattatsatyam | āpa eva tadāpo hi vai satyaṃ tasmādyenāpo yanti tatsatyasya
GV03sb_07_u:974: yadveva puṣkaraparṇamupadadhāti | āpo vai puṣkaraṃ tāsāmiyam parṇaṃ yathā ha
GV03sb_07_u:977: tāmanantarhitāṃ satyādupadadhātīmāṃ tatsatye pratiṣṭhāpayati tasmādiyaṃ satye
GV03sb_07_u:980: apām pṛṣṭhamasi yoniragneriti | apāṃ hīyam pṛṣṭhaṃ yonirhīyamagneḥ
GV03sb_07_u:981: samudramabhitaḥ pinvamānamiti samudro homāmabhitaḥ pinvate vardhamāno
GV03sb_07_u:982: mahāṃ ā ca puṣkara iti vardhamāno mahīyasva puṣkara ityetaddivo mātrayā
GV03sb_07_u:983: varimṇā prathasvetyanuvimārṣṭyasau vā āditya eṣo 'gnirno haitamanyo divo varimā
GV03sb_07_u:984: yantumarhati dyaurbhūtvainaṃ yacetyevaitadāha svarājopaddhāti svārājyaṃ hyapāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:987: atha rukbhamupadadhāti | asau vā āditya eṣa rukbha eṣa hīmāḥ sarvāḥ prajā
GV03sb_07_u:988: atirocate roco ha vai taṃ rukbha ityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi devā
GV03sb_07_u:991: etasya nirbādhā avastādu vā etasya raśmayaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:996: yadveva puṣkaraparṇa upadadhāti | pratiṣṭhā vai puṣkaraparṇamiyaṃ vai
GV03sb_07_u:997: puṣkaraparṇamiyamu vai pratiṣṭhā yo vā asyāmapratiṣṭhito 'pi dūre
GV03sb_07_u:998: sannapratiṣṭhita eva sa raśmibhirvā eṣo 'syām pratiṣṭhito
GV03sb_07_u:1001: yadveva puṣkaraparṇa upadadhāti | indro vṛtraṃ hatvā nāstṛṣīti manyamāno 'paḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1002: prāviśattā abravīdbibhemi vai puram me kuruteti sa yo 'pāṃ rasa āsīttamūrdhvaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1004: pūṣkaraṃ ha vai tatpuṣkaramityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi
GV03sb_07_u:1008: brahma jajñānam prathamam purastāditi | asau vā ādityo brahmāharahaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1009: purastājjāyate vi sīmataḥ suruco vena āvariti madhyaṃ vai sīmeme lokāḥ suruco
GV03sb_07_u:1011: vivṛṣvannudeti sa budhnyā upamā asya viṣṭhā iti diśo vā asya budhnyā upamā
GV03sb_07_u:1012: viṣṭhāstā hyeṣa upavitiṣṭhate sataśca yonimasataśca vivaritīme vai lokāḥ sataśca
GV03sb_07_u:1013: yonirasataśca yacca hyasti yacca na tadebhya eva lokebhyo jāyate triṣṭubhopadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1014: traiṣṭabho hyeṣa sādayitvā sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1016: atha puruṣamupadadhāti | sa prajāpatiḥ so 'gniḥ sa yajamānaḥ sa hiraṇmayo bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:1017: jyotirvai hiraṇyaṃ jyotiragniramṛtaṃ hiraṇyamamṛtamagniḥ puruṣo bhavati puruṣo
GV03sb_07_u:1023: aramanta tadyadasyaitasyāṃ ramyāyāṃ tanvāṃ devā aramanta tasmāddhiramyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1024: hiramyaṃ ha vai taddhiraṇyamityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi
GV03sb_07_u:1025: devāstathaivāsminnayametāṃ ramyāṃ tanūm madhyato dadhāti tasyāmasya devā
GV03sb_07_u:1026: ramante prāṇo vā asya sā ramyā tanūḥ prāṇamevāsminnetam madhyato dadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1028: taṃ rukbha upadadhāti | asau vā āditya eṣa rukbho 'tha ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale
GV03sb_07_u:1031: uttānamupadadhāti | etadvai devā abruvanyadi vā imāvarvāñcā upadhāsyāmaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1032: sarvamevedam pradhakṣyato yadyu parāñcau parāñcāveva tapsyato yadyu
GV03sb_07_u:1034: 'rvāñcamanyamupādadhuḥ parāñcamanyaṃ sa eṣa raśmibhirarvāṅ tapati rukbhaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1035: prāṇaireṣa ūrdhvaḥ puruṣaḥ prāñcamupadadhāti prāṅ hyeṣo 'gniścīyate
GV03sb_07_u:1037: hiraṇyagarbhaḥ samavartatāgra iti | hiraṇyagarbho hyeṣa samavartatāgre bhūtasya
GV03sb_07_u:1038: jātaḥ patireka āsīdityeṣa hyasya sarvasya bhūtasya jātaḥ patireka āsītsa dādhāra
GV03sb_07_u:1039: pṛthivīṃ dyāmutemāmityeṣa vai divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ ca dādhāra kasmai devāya haviṣa
GV03sb_07_u:1040: vidhemeti prajā patirvai kastasmai haviṣā vidhemetyetat
GV03sb_07_u:1042: drapsaścaskanda pṛthivīmanu dyāmiti | asau vā ādityo drapsaḥ sa divaṃ ca pṛthivīṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1043: ca skandatītyamūmitīmāmimaṃ ca yonimanu yaśca pūrva itīmaṃ ca lokamamuṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1044: cetyetadatho yaccedametarhi cīyate yaccādaḥ pūrvamacīyateti samānaṃ yonimanu
GV03sb_07_u:1045: saṃcarantamiti samānaṃ hyepa etaṃ yonimanu saṃcarati drapsaṃ juhomyanu sapta
GV03sb_07_u:1046: hotrā ityasau vā ādityo drapso diśaḥ sapta hotrā amuṃ tadādityaṃ dikṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1053: atha sāma gāyati | etadvai devā etam puruṣamupadhāya
GV03sb_07_u:1056: te 'bruvan | upa tajjānīta yathāsminpuruṣe vīryaṃ dadhāmeti te
GV03sb_07_u:1062: puruṣe gāyati puruṣe tadvīryaṃ dadhāti citre gāyati sarvāṇi hi
GV03sb_07_u:1065: atha sarpanāmairupatiṣṭhata | ime vai lokāḥ sarpāste hānena sarveṇa sarpanti
GV03sb_07_u:1066: yadidaṃ kiṃ ca sarveṣāmu haiṣa devānāmātmā yadagniste devā
GV03sb_07_u:1067: etamātmānamupadhāyābibhayuryadvai na ime lokā anenātmanā na surpeyuriti
GV03sb_07_u:1072: etallokāntsthāpayatīmāṃlokānnamayati tatho hāsyaita etenātmanā na sarpanti
GV03sb_07_u:1074: yadveva sarpanāmairupatiṣṭhata | ime vai lokāḥ sarpā yaddhi kiṃ ca sarpatyeṣveva
GV03sb_07_u:1075: tallokeṣu sarpati tadyatsarpanāmairupatiṣṭhate yaivaiṣu lokeṣu nāṣṭrā yo
GV03sb_07_u:1078: namo 'stu sarpebhyo ye ke ca pṛthivīmanu | ye antarikṣe ye divi tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo
GV03sb_07_u:1079: nama iti ya evaiṣu triṣu lokeṣu sarpāstebhya etannamaskaroti
GV03sb_07_u:1081: yā iṣavo yātudhānānāmiti | yātudhānapreṣitā haike daśanti ye vā vanaspatīmranu ye
GV03sb_07_u:1082: vāvaṭeṣu śerate tebhyaḥ sarpebhyo nama iti ye caiva vanaspatiṣu sarpā ye cāvaṭeṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1085: ye vāmī rocane divo | ye vā sūryasya raśmiṣu yeṣāmapsu sadaskṛtaṃ tebhyaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1086: sarpebhyo nama iti yatra yatraite tadevaibhya etannamaskaroti namo nama iti yajño
GV03sb_07_u:1087: vai namo yajñenaivainānetannamaskāreṇa namasyati tasmādu ha nāyajñiya
GV03sb_07_u:1088: brūyānnamasta iti yathā hainam brūyādyajñasta iti tādṛktat
GV03sb_07_u:1090: tribhirupatiṣṭhate | traya ime lokā atho trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_07_u:1092: tiṣṭhannupatiṣṭhate tiṣṭhantīva vā ime lokā atho tiṣṭhanvai vīryavattaraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1094: athainamupaviśyābhijuhoti | ājyena pañcagṛhītena tasyokto bandhuḥ sarvataḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1098: imamiha rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etānrākṣoghnānpratisarānapaśyankṛṇuṣva
GV03sb_07_u:1099: pājaḥ prasitiṃ na pṛthvīmiti rākṣoghnā vai pratisarāsta etaiḥ pratisaraiḥ sarvābhyo
GV03sb_07_u:1100: digbhyo rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭra etamātmānaṃ samaskurvata
GV03sb_07_u:1101: tathaivaitadyajamāna etaiḥ pratisaraiḥ sarvābhyo digbhyo rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_07_u:1104: ājyena juhoti | vajro vā ājyaṃ vajreṇaivaitaprakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahanti pañcagṛhītena
GV03sb_07_u:1108: triṣṭubvajreṇaivaitadrakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahanti sarvataḥ parisarpaṃ sarvābhya
GV03sb_07_u:1115: atha srucā upadadhāti | bāhū vai srucau bāhū evāsminnetatpratidadhāti te yatsrucau
GV03sb_07_u:1116: bhavataḥ srucau hi bāhū idameva kapucalamayaṃ daṇdo dve bhavato dvau hīmau
GV03sb_07_u:1117: bāhū pāśvata upadadhāti pārśvato hīmau bāhū
GV03sb_07_u:1119: kārṣmaryamayīṃ dakṣiṇata upadadhāti | etadvai devā abibhayuryadvai no yajñaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1120: dakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā na hanyuriti ta etaṃ rakṣohaṇaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1121: vanaspatimapaśyankārṣmaryaṃ ta etena vanaspatinā dakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā
GV03sb_07_u:1122: apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭra etaṃ yajñamatanvata tathaivaitadyajamāna etena vanaspatinā
GV03sb_07_u:1123: dakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahatyābhaye 'nāṣṭra etaṃ yajñaṃ tanuta ājyena pūrṇā
GV03sb_07_u:1124: bhavati vajro vā ājyaṃ vajreṇaivaitaddakṣiṇato rakṣāṃsi nāṣṭrā apahanti
GV03sb_07_u:1126: athaudumbarīmuttarata upadadhāti | ūrgvai rasa udumbara ūrjamevāsminnetadrasaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1127: dadhāti dadhnā pūrṇā bhavati raso vai dadhi rasamevāsminnetaddadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1129: yadveva srucā upadadhāti | prajāpatervisrastasyāgnisteja ādāya dakṣiṇākarṣatso
GV03sb_07_u:1133: tāvabravīt | upa metam prati ma etaddhattaṃ yena me yuvamudakramiṣṭamiti
GV03sb_07_u:1134: tābhyāṃ vai nau sarvamannam prayaceti tau vai mā bāhū bhūtvā prapadyethāmiti
GV03sb_07_u:1135: tatheti tābhyāṃ vai sarvamannam prāyacattāvenam bāhū bhūtvā prāpadyetāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1136: tasmādbāhubhyāmevānnaṃ kriyate bāhubhyāmadyate bāhubhyāṃ hi sa sarvamannam
GV03sb_07_u:1139: sa kārṣmaryamayīṃ dakṣiṇata upadadhāti | agneṣṭvā tejasā sādayāmīti yadevāsya
GV03sb_07_u:1142: tāvataivaināmetadupadadhāti ghṛtena pūrṇā bhavatyāgneyaṃ vai ghṛtaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1145: athaudumbarīmuttarata upadadhāti | indrasya tvaujasā sādayāmīti yadevāsya
GV03sb_07_u:1147: netetyeṣa u sa indraḥ sā yadāgneyyagnikarma hyatha yattriṣṭuptraiṣṭubho hīndra
GV03sb_07_u:1150: tāvataivaināmetadupadadhāti dadhnā pūrṇā bhavatyaindraṃ vai dadhi
GV03sb_07_u:1153: tāvasyaitāvindrāgnī eva bāhū | tāvenaṃ tejasā ca vīryeṇa ca saha prapadyete sa
GV03sb_07_u:1157: te haike tiraścyā upadadhati | tiryañcau vā imau bāhū iti na tathā
GV03sb_07_u:1158: kuryātprācyāvevopadadhyātprāṅ hyeṣo 'gniścīyate 'tho evaṃ vai bāhū vīryavattarau
GV03sb_07_u:1160: nānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā hīmau bāhū
GV03sb_07_u:1162: tadāhuḥ | naitasya puruṣasya bāhū kuryādetau vā asya bāhū ye ete srucau
GV03sb_07_u:1163: nedatirecayānīti sa vai kuryādevaitau vā asya bāhū anvete srucāvatho etau
GV03sb_07_u:1165: yāni candāṃsyetayoreva sā saṃskṛtiretayorvṛddhistasmādu kuryādevaitasya puruṣasya
GV03sb_07_u:1170: svayamātṛṇeyamu vā annamasyāṃ hi sarvamannam pacyate
GV03sb_07_u:1173: yadveva svayamātṛṇāmupadadhāti | prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇā prāṇo
GV03sb_07_u:1175: puruṣādupadadhāti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇeyaṃ vai svayamātṛṇeyamu vai prāṇo yaddhi
GV03sb_07_u:1179: yadveva svayamātṛṇāmupadadhāti | prajāpatiṃ visrastaṃ devatā ādāya
GV03sb_07_u:1182: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatirvyasraṃsata | ayameva sa yo 'yamagniścīyate 'tha yā sā
GV03sb_07_u:1187: dhruvāsīti sthirāsītyetadatho pratiṣṭhitāsīti dharuṇeti pratiṣṭhā vai dharuṇamāstṛtā
GV03sb_07_u:1188: viśvakarmaṇeti prajāpatirvai viśvakarmā tenāstṛtāsītyetanmā tvā samudra
GV03sb_07_u:1189: udvadhīnmā suparṇa iti rukbho vai samudraḥ puruṣaḥ suparṇastau tvā
GV03sb_07_u:1190: modvadhiṣṭāmityetadavyathamānā pṛthivīṃ dṛṃheti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1192: prajāpatiṣṭvā sādayatviti | prajāpatirhyetām prathamāṃ citimapaśyadapām pṛṣṭhe
GV03sb_07_u:1193: samudrasyemannityapāṃ hīyam pṛṣṭhaṃ samudrasya hīyamema vyacasvatīm
GV03sb_07_u:1194: prathasvatīmiti vyacasvatī ca hīyam prathasvatī ca prathasva pṛthivyasīti prathasva
GV03sb_07_u:1197: bhūrasīti | bhūrhīyam bhūmirasīti bhūmirhīyamaditirasītīyaṃ vā aditiriyaṃ hīdaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1198: sarvaṃ dadate viśvadhāyā ityasyāṃ hīdaṃ sarvaṃ hitaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya dhartrīti
GV03sb_07_u:1199: sarvasya bhuvanasya dhartrītyetatpṛthivīṃ yaca pṛthivīṃ dṛṃha pṛthivīm mā
GV03sb_07_u:1202: viśvasmai prāṇāyāpānāya | vyānāyodānāyeti prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇā sarvasmā u vā
GV03sb_07_u:1203: etasmai prāṇaḥ pratiṣṭhāyai caritrāyetīme vai lokāḥ svayamātṛṇā ima u lokāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1205: mahatyā svastyetyetaccardiṣā śaṃtameneti yaccardiḥ śaṃtamaṃ tenetyetatsādayitvā
GV03sb_07_u:1206: sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuratha sāma gāyati tasyopari bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1208: tadāhuḥ | kathamepa puruṣaḥ svayamātṛṇayānabhinihito bhavatītyannaṃ vai
GV03sb_07_u:1209: svayamātṛṇā prāṇaḥ svayamātṛṇānabhinihito v ai puruṣo 'nnena ca prāṇena ca
GV03sb_07_u:1211: atha dūrveṣṭakāmupadadhāti | paśavo vai dūrveṣṭakā paśūnevaitadupadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1216: yadveva dūrveṣṭakāmupadadhāti | prajāpatervisrastasya yāni lomānyaśīyanta tā imā
GV03sb_07_u:1219: so 'bravīt | ayaṃ vāva mādhūrvīditi yadabravīdadhūrvīnmeti tasmāddhūrvā dhūrvā
GV03sb_07_u:1221: vai tāṃ dūrvetyācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi devāstadetatkṣatram prāṇo
GV03sb_07_u:1222: hyeṣa raso lomānyanyā oṣadhaya etāmupadadhatsarvā oṣadhīrupadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1224: taṃ yatra devāḥ samaskurvam | stadasminnetam prāṇaṃ rasam madhyato
GV03sb_07_u:1227: oṣadhīrdadhātyuttarāmuttarāstadasyā oṣadhīrdadhāti sā syātsamūlā sāgrā kṛtsnatāyai
GV03sb_07_u:1232: parvaṇaḥ-parvaṇaḥ prarohatyevā no pūrve pratanu sahasreṇa śatena ceti yathaiva
GV03sb_07_u:1235: yā śatena pratanoṣi | sahasreṇa virohasīti śatena hyeṣā pratanoti sahasreṇa virohati
GV03sb_07_u:1236: tasyāste devīṣṭake vidhema haviṣā vayamiti yathaiva yajustathā
GV03sb_07_u:1240: atha dviyajuṣamupadadhāti | indrāgnī akāmayetāṃ svargaṃ lokamiyāveti
GV03sb_07_u:1243: yena rūpeṇa yatkarma kṛtvendrāgnī svargaṃ lokamaitāṃ tena rūpeṇa tatkarma kṛtvā
GV03sb_07_u:1244: svargaṃ lokamayānīti sā yaddviyajurnāma dve hyetāṃ devate apaśyatāṃ yadveva
GV03sb_07_u:1247: tadāhuḥ | yadasāveva yajamāno yo 'sau hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo 'tha katamadasyedaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1248: rūpamiti daivo vā asya sa ātmā manuṣo 'yaṃ tadyatsa hiraṇmayo bhavatyamṛtaṃ vā
GV03sb_07_u:1249: asya tadrūpaṃ devarūpamamṛtaṃ hiraṇyamatha yadiyam mṛdaḥ kṛtā bhavati mānuṣaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1253: preyādatha yadimāmapaśinaṣṭi yadevāsyedam mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tadasyaitadapaśinaṣṭi
GV03sb_07_u:1256: sa yannānūpadadhyāt | na haitaṃ daivamātmānamanuprajānīyādatha yadanūpadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1257: tatho haitaṃ daivamātmānamanuprajānāti tāmanantarhitāṃ dūrveṣṭakāyā upadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1258: paśavo vai dūrveṣṭakā yajamānaṃ tatpaśuṣu pratiṣṭhāpayati
GV03sb_07_u:1260: tadāhuḥ | kathamasyaitāvātmānau prāṇena saṃtatāvavyavacinnau bhavata iti prāṇo vai
GV03sb_07_u:1261: svayamātṛṇā prāṇo dūrveṣṭakā yajamāno dviyajuḥ sa yadanantarhitāṃ svayamātṛṇāyai
GV03sb_07_u:1263: yadanantarhitāṃ dūrveṣṭakāyai dviyajuṣamupadadhāti prāṇo vai dūrveṣṭakā
GV03sb_07_u:1264: yajamāno dviyajurevamu hāsyaitāvātmānau prāṇena saṃtatāvavyavacinnau bhavataḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1266: yāste agne sūrye ruco | yā vo devāḥ sūrye ruca iti rucaṃ rucamityamṛtatvaṃ vai
GV03sb_07_u:1268: dvayaṃ hyevaitadrūpam mṛccāpaśca sādayitvā sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1270: atha retaḥsicā upadadhāti | imau vai lokau retaḥsicāvimau hyeva lokau retaḥ siñcata
GV03sb_07_u:1271: ito vā ayamūrdhvaṃ retaḥ siñcati dhūmaṃ sāmutra vṛṣṭirbhavati tāmasāvamuto
GV03sb_07_u:1272: vṛṣṭiṃ tadimā antareṇa prajāyante tasmādimau lokau retaḥsicau
GV03sb_07_u:1274: virāḍjyotiradhārayaditi | ayaṃ vai loko virāṭ sa imamagniṃ jyotirdhārayati
GV03sb_07_u:1275: svarāḍjyotiradhārayadityasau vai lokaḥ svarāṭ so mumādityaṃ jyotirdhārayati
GV03sb_07_u:1276: virāḍvahemau lokau svarāṭca nānopadadhāti nānā hīmau lokau sakṛtsādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1279: yadveva retaḥsicā upadadhāti | āṇḍau vai retaḥsicau yasya hyāṇḍau bhavataḥ sa eva
GV03sb_07_u:1281: svarāṭca tāvetajjyotirdhārayato reta eva prajāpatimeva nānopadadhāti nānā
GV03sb_07_u:1282: homāvāṇḍau sakṛtsādayati samānaṃ tatkaroti tasmātsamānasambandhanau te
GV03sb_07_u:1283: anantarhite dviyajuṣa upadadhāti yajamāno vai dviyajuranantarhitau
GV03sb_07_u:1291: yadveva viśvajyotiṣamupadadhāti | prajā vai viśvajyotiḥ prajā hyeva viśvaṃ jyotiḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1296: prajāpatiṣṭvā sādayatviti | prajāpatirhyetām prathamāṃ citimapaśyatpṛṣṭhe pṛthivyā
GV03sb_07_u:1299: viśvasmai prāṇāyāpānāya | vyānāyeti prāṇo vai viśvajyotiḥ sarvasmā u etasmai prāṇo
GV03sb_07_u:1303: atha 'rtavye upadadhāti | ṛtava ete yadṛtavye ṛtūnevaitadupadadhāti madhuśca
GV03sb_07_u:1304: mādhavaśca vāsantikāvṛtū iti nāmanī enayorete nāmabhyāmevaine etadupadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1305: dve iṣṭake bhavato dvau hi māsāvṛtuḥ sakṛtsādayatyekaṃ tadṛtuṃ karoti
GV03sb_07_u:1307: tadyadete atropadadhāti | saṃvatsara eṣo 'gnirima u lokāḥ saṃvatsarastasyāyameva
GV03sb_07_u:1308: lokaḥ prathamā citirayamasya loko vasanta ṛtustadyadete atropadadhāti yadevāsyaite
GV03sb_07_u:1312: pratiṣṭhaiva prathamā citiḥ pratiṣṭho asya vasanta ṛtustadyadete atropadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1314: anantarhite viśvajyotiṣa upadadhāti prajā vai viśvajyotiranantarhitāstatprajā ṛtubhyo
GV03sb_07_u:1315: dadhāti tasmātprajā ṛtūnevānuprajāyanta ṛtubhirhyeva garbhe santaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1318: athāṣāḍhāmupadadhāti | iyaṃ vā aṣāḍhemāmevaitadupadadhāti tām pūrvārdha
GV03sb_07_u:1321: sā yadaṣāḍhā nāma | devāścāsurāścobhaye prājāpatyā aspardhanta te devā
GV03sb_07_u:1332: seyaṃ vāmabhṛt | prāṇā vai vāmaṃ yaddhi kiṃ ca prāṇīyaṃ tatsarvam bibharti teneyaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1333: vāmabhṛdvāggha tveva vābhṛtprāṇā vai vāmaṃ vāci vai prāṇebhyo 'nnaṃ dhīyate
GV03sb_07_u:1336: ta ete sarve prāṇā yadaṣāḍhā | tām pūrvārdha upadadhāti purastāttatprāṇāndadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1340: yadvapasyāḥ pañca purastādupadadhāti | annaṃ vā āpo 'napihitā vā annena
GV03sb_07_u:1345: saṃvatsaro vā ṛtavye saṃvatsareṇa tatprajābhyo vācamantardadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1348: aṣāḍhāsi sahamāneti | asahanta hyetayā devā asurāntsahasvārātīḥ sahasva pṛtanāyata
GV03sb_07_u:1349: iti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ sahasravīryāsi sā mā jinveti sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1350: sarvavīryāsi sā mā jinvetyetatsādayitvā sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1352: tadāhuḥ | kasmādabhisvayamātṛṇamanyā iṣṭakā upadhīyante prācya etā iti dve vai
GV03sb_07_u:1353: yonī iti brūyāddevayoniranyo manuṣyayoniranyaḥ prācīnaprajananā vai devāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1357: kūrmamupadadhāti | raso vai kūrmo rasamevaitadupadadhāti yo vai sa eṣāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1359: yāvānu vai rasastāvānātmā sa eṣa ima eva lokāḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1361: tasya yadadharaṃ kapālam | ayaṃ sa lokastatpratiṣṭhitamiva bhavati pratiṣṭhita iva
GV03sb_07_u:1362: hyayaṃ loko 'tha yaduttaraṃ sā dyaustadbyavagṛhītāntamiva bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:1363: vyavagṛhītānteva hi dyauratha yadantarā tadantarikṣaṃ sa eṣa ima eva lokā
GV03sb_07_u:1366: tamabhyanakti | dadhnā madhunā ghṛtena dadhi haivāsya lokasya rūpaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1368: dadhi haivāsya lokasya raso ghṛtamantarikṣasya madhvamuṣya
GV03sb_07_u:1371: madhu vātā ṛtāyata iti | yāṃ vai devatāmṛgabhyanūktā yāṃ yajuḥ saiva devatā sa 'kṣo
GV03sb_07_u:1372: devatā tadyajustaddhaitanmadhvevaiṣa trico raso vai madhu
GV03sb_07_u:1375: sa yatkūrmo nāma | etadvai rūpaṃ kṛtvā prajāpatiḥ prajā asṛjata
GV03sb_07_u:1379: sa yaḥ kūrmo 'sau sa ādityo | 'mumevaitadādityamupadadhāti taṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1381: tasmādasāvādityaḥ purastātpratyaṅ dhīyate dakṣiṇato 'ṣāḍhāyai vṛṣā vai kūrmo
GV03sb_07_u:1382: yoṣāṣāḍhā dakṣiṇato vai vṛṣā yoṣāmupaśete 'ratnimātre 'ratnimātrāddhi vṛṣā
GV03sb_07_u:1383: yoṣāmupaśete saiṣā sarvāsāmiṣṭakānām mahiṣī yadaṣāḍhaitasyai dakṣiṇataḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1386: yadveva kūrmamupadadhāti | prāṇo vai kūrmaḥ prāṇo hīmāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ karoti
GV03sb_07_u:1388: prāṇaṃ dadhāti tasmātpurastātpratyaṅ prāṇo dhīyate puruṣamabhyāvṛttaṃ yajamāne
GV03sb_07_u:1389: tatprāṇaṃ dadhāti dakṣiṇato 'ṣāḍhāyai prāṇo vai kūrmo vāgaṣāḍhā prāṇo vai vāco
GV03sb_07_u:1392: apāṃ gambhantstīdeti | etaddhāpāṃ gambhiṣṭhaṃ yatraiṣa etattapati mā tvā sūryo
GV03sb_07_u:1393: 'bhitāpsīnmāgnirvaiśvānara iti maiva tvā sūryo hiṃsīnmo agnirvaiśvānara
GV03sb_07_u:1394: ityetadacinnapatrāḥ prajā anuvīkṣasvetīmā vai sarvāḥ prajā yā imā iṣṭakāstā ariṣṭā
GV03sb_07_u:1395: anārtā anuvīkṣasvetyetadanu tvā divyā vṛṣṭiḥ sacatāmiti yathaivainaṃ divyā
GV03sb_07_u:1398: athainamejayati | trīntsamudrāntsamasṛpatsvargānitīme vai trayaḥ samudrāḥ svargā
GV03sb_07_u:1399: lokāstāneṣa kūrmo bhūtvānusaṃsasarpāpām patirvṛṣabha iṣṭakānāmityapāṃ hyeṣa
GV03sb_07_u:1400: patirvṛṣabha iṣṭakānām purīṣaṃ vasānaḥ sukṛtasya loka iti paśavo vai purīṣam
GV03sb_07_u:1401: paśūnvasānaḥ sukṛtasya loka ityetattatra gaca yatra pūrve paretā iti tatra gaca
GV03sb_07_u:1404: mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na iti | mahatī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na ityetadimaṃ yajñam
GV03sb_07_u:1405: mimikṣatāmitīmaṃ yajñamavatāmityetatpipṛtāṃ no bharīmabhiriti bibhṛtāṃ no
GV03sb_07_u:1408: tribhirupadadhāti | traya ime lokā atho trivṛdagniryāvānagniryāvatyasya mātrā
GV03sb_07_u:1410: adhastādbhavantyavakā upariṣṭādāpo vā avakā apāmevainametanmadhyato dadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1413: atholūkhalamusale upadadhāti | viṣṇurakāmayatānnādaḥ syāmiti sa ete iṣṭake
GV03sb_07_u:1415: yadulūkhalamusale upadadhāti yena rūpeṇa yatkarma kṛtvā viṣṇurannādo 'bhavattena
GV03sb_07_u:1419: te retaḥsicorvelayopadadhāti | pṛṣṭayo vai retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyata
GV03sb_07_u:1425: ātmasammitamannaṃ tadavati tanna hinasti yadbhūyo hinasti tadyatkanīyo na
GV03sb_07_u:1428: audumbare bhavataḥ | ūrgvai rasa udumbara ūrjamevāsminnetadrasaṃ dadhātyatho
GV03sb_07_u:1429: sarva ete vanaspatayo yadudumbara ete upadadhatsarvānvanaspatīnupadadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1431: tasmādanayorvanaspatayaścatuḥsrakti bhavati catasro vai diśaḥ sarvāsu taddikṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1432: vanaspatīndadhāti tasmātsarvāsu dikṣu vanaspatayo madhye saṃgṛhītam
GV03sb_07_u:1445: ggṛhītā yo hyevānnamatti sa prāṇiti tamūrjayati
GV03sb_07_u:1447: ūrji gṛhītāyām | asmādete ubhe udacikramiṣatāṃ te ūrjāgṛhṇāttasmādete ubhe ūrjā
GV03sb_07_u:1451: tadetadannam prapadyamānaṃ sarve devā anuprāpadyantānnajīvanaṃ hīdaṃ sarvam
GV03sb_07_u:1453: tadeṣa śloko 'bhyuktaḥ | tadvai sa prāṇo 'bhavaditi taddhi sa prāṇo 'bhavanmahā
GV03sb_07_u:1454: bhūtvā prajāpatiriti mahānhi sa tadabhavadyadenamete devāḥ prāpadyanta bhujo
GV03sb_07_u:1455: bhujiṣyā vittveti prāṇā vai bhujo 'nnam bhujiṣyā etatsarvaṃ vittvetye
GV03sb_07_u:1458: yatprajāpatiḥ prāṇayattasmādu prajāpatiḥ prāṇo yo vai sa prāṇa eṣā sā gāyatryatha
GV03sb_07_u:1459: yattadannameṣa sa viṣṇurdevatātha yā so 'rgeṣa sa udumbaraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1461: so 'bravīt | ayaṃ vāva mā sarvasmātpāpmana udabhārṣīditi
GV03sb_07_u:1462: yadabravīdudabhārṣīnmeti tasmādupumbhara udumbharo ha vai tamudumbara
GV03sb_07_u:1463: ityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro 'kṣakāmā hi devā uru me karaditi
GV03sb_07_u:1464: tasmādurukaramurukaraṃ ha vai tadulūkhalamityācakṣate paro 'kṣam paro
GV03sb_07_u:1465: 'kṣakāmā hi devāḥ saiṣā sarveṣām prāṇānāṃ yoniryadulūkhalaṃ śiro vai prāṇānāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1468: tatprādeśamātram bhavati | prādeśamātramiva hi śiraścatuḥsrakti bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:1469: catuḥsraktīva hi śiro madhye saṃgṛhītam bhavati madhye saṃgṛhītamiva hi śiraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1471: taṃ yatra devāḥ samaskurvan | tadasminnetatsarvam madhyato 'dadhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1473: retaḥsicau madhyamu pṛṣṭayo madhyata evāsminnetatsarvaṃ dadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1475: viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyateti | vīryaṃ vai karma viṣṇorvīryāṇi paśyatetyetadyato vratāni
GV03sb_07_u:1476: paspaśa ityannaṃ vai vrataṃ yato 'nnaṃ spāśayāṃ cakra ityetadindrasya yujyaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1477: sakhetīndrasya hyeṣa yujyaḥ sakhā dvidevatyayopadadhāti dvehyulūkhalamumale
GV03sb_07_u:1478: sakṛtsādayati samānaṃ tatkaroti samānaṃ hyetadannameva sādayitvā
GV03sb_07_u:1482: upadadhātyantarikṣaṃ vā ulūkhalaṃ yadvai kiṃ cāsyā ūrdhvamantarikṣameva
GV03sb_07_u:1483: tanmadhyaṃ vā antarikṣam madhyatastadyoniṃ dadhāti tasmātsarveṣām bhūtānām
GV03sb_07_u:1486: yadvevokhāmupadadhāti | yo vai sa prajāpatirvyasraṃsasataiṣā sokheme vai lokā
GV03sb_07_u:1491: athopaśayām piṣṭvā | lokabhājamukhāṃ kṛtvā purastādukhāyā upanivapatyeṣa
GV03sb_07_u:1494: tadāhuḥ | kathamasyaiṣā pakvā śṛtopahitā bhavatītiṃ yadeva yajuṣkṛtā tenātho
GV03sb_07_u:1495: yadvai kiṃ caitamagniṃ vaiśvānaramupanigacati tata eva tatpakvaṃ śṛtamupahitam
GV03sb_07_u:1498: dhruvāsi dharuṇeti | tasyokto bandhurito jajñe prathamamebhyo yonibhyo adhi
GV03sb_07_u:1499: jātavedā ityetebhyo hi yonibhyaḥ prathamaṃ jātavedā ajāyata sa gāyatryā
GV03sb_07_u:1500: triṣṭubhānuṣṭubhā ca devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānannityetairvā eṣa
GV03sb_07_u:1503: iṣe rāye ramasva | sahase dyumna ūrje apatyāyetyetasmai sarvasmai
GV03sb_07_u:1504: ramasvetyetatsamrāḍasi svarāḍasīti samrāṭca hyeṣa svarāṭca sārasvatau tvotsau
GV03sb_07_u:1505: prāpavatāmiti mano vai sarasvānvākṣarasvatyetau sārasvatā utsau tau tvā
GV03sb_07_u:1507: mṛccā paśca sādayitvā sūdadohasādhivadati tasyokto bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1509: athaināmabhijuhoti | etadvā asyāmetatpūrvaṃ retaḥ siktam bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:1510: sikatāstadetadabhikaroti tasmādyonau retaḥ siktamabhikriyata ājyena juhoti sruveṇa
GV03sb_07_u:1513: agne yukṣvā hi ye tava | yukṣvā hi devahūtamāniti
GV03sb_07_u:1514: yuktavatībhyāmidamevaitadyonau reto yunakti tasmādyonau reto yuktaṃ na
GV03sb_07_u:1517: sa yadi saṃvatsarabhṛtaḥ syāt | athābhijuhuyātsarvaṃ vai t adyatsaṃvatsarabhṛtaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1518: sarvaṃ tadyadabhijuhītyatha yadyasaṃvatsarabhṛtaḥ syādupaiva tiṣṭhetāsarvaṃ vai
GV03sb_07_u:1521: paśureṣa yadagniḥ | so 'traiva sarvaḥ kṛtsnaḥ saṃskṛtastasyāvāṅ prāṇaḥ svayamātṛṇā
GV03sb_07_u:1522: śroṇī dviyajuḥ pṛṣṭayo retaḥsicau kīkasā viśvajyotiḥ kakudamṛtavye grīvā aṣāḍhā
GV03sb_07_u:1523: śiraḥ kūrmo ye kūrme prāṇā ye śīrṣanprāṇāste te
GV03sb_07_u:1525: taṃ vā etam | ita ūrdhvam prāñcaṃ cinotyasau vā āditya eṣo 'gniramu tadādityamita
GV03sb_07_u:1526: ūrdhvam prāñcaṃ dadhāti tasmādasāvāditya ita ūrdhvaḥ prāṅ dhīyate
GV03sb_07_u:1528: athainam prasalavyāvartayati | amuṃ tadāditya prasalavyāvartayati tasmādasāvāditya
GV03sb_07_u:1532: hyudaramadharā yoniḥ śiśnam musalaṃ tadvṛttamiva bhavati vṛttamiva hi śiśnaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1533: taddakṣiṇata upadadhāti dakṣiṇato vai vṛṣā yoṣāmupaśete yadu paśoḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1534: saṃskṛtasyānnaṃ taddūrveṣṭakā tasya vā etasyottaro 'rdha udāhitataro bhavati
GV03sb_07_u:1538: tānyukhāyāmupadadhātīme vai lokā ukhā paśavaḥ paśuśīrṣāṇyeṣu tallokeṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1541: yadvevokhāyām | yonirvā ukhā paśavaḥ paśuśīrṣāṇi yonau tatpaśūnpratiṣṭhāpayati
GV03sb_07_u:1542: tasmādadyamānāḥ pacyamānāḥ paśavo na kṣīyante yonau hyenānpratiṣṭhāpayati
GV03sb_07_u:1544: yadveva paśuśīrṣāṇyupadadhāti | yā vai tāḥ śriya etāni tāni paśuśīrṣāṇyatha yāni
GV03sb_07_u:1546: kusindhānyetāstāḥ pañca citayastadyāstāḥ pañca citaya ime te lokāstadye ta ime lokā
GV03sb_07_u:1550: tānpurastātpratīca upadadhāti | etadvai yatraitānprajāpatiḥ paśūnālipsata ta
GV03sb_07_u:1554: tadvā etatkriyate | yaddevā akurvannidaṃ nvasmātte paśavo noccikramiṣanti
GV03sb_07_u:1558: yadveva paśuśīrṣāṇyupadadhāti | prajāpatirvā idamagra āsīdeka eva so
GV03sb_07_u:1559: 'kāmayatānnaṃ sṛjeya prajāyeyeti sa prāṇebhya evādhi paśūnniramimīta manasaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1560: puruṣa cakṣuṣo 'śvam prāṇādgāṃ śrotrādaviṃ vāco 'jaṃ tadyadenānprāṇebhyo 'dhi
GV03sb_07_u:1561: niramimīta tasmādāhuḥ prāṇāḥ paśava iti mano vai prāṇānām prathamaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1562: tadyatmanasaḥ puruṣaṃ niramimīta tasmādāhuḥ puruṣaḥ prathamaḥ paśūnāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1563: vīryavattama iti mano vai sarve ghrāṇā manasi hi sarve prāṇāḥ

GV03sb_07_u:1567: tadetadannaṃ sṛṣṭvā | purastātpratyagātmannadhatta tasmādyaḥ kaścānnaṃ sṛjate

GV03sb_07_u:1571: athaiṣu hiraṇyaśakalānpratyasyati | prāṇo vai hiraṇyamatha vā etebhyaḥ paśubhyaḥ

GV03sb_07_u:1580: vā etānpaśūnupadadhāti sapta-sapta vā ekaikasminpaśau prāṇāstadeṣu sarveṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1581: prāṇāndadhma iti na tathā kuryādetasminvai paśau sarveṣām paśūnāṃ rūpaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1584: mukhe prathamam pratyasyati | samyakṣravanti sarito na dhenā ityannaṃ vai
GV03sb_07_u:1586: hṛdayena manasā satānnam pūtaṃ ya ṛjustasya ghṛtasya dhārā abhicākaśīmīti yā
GV03sb_07_u:1587: evaitasminnagnāvāhutīrhoṣyanbhavati tā etadāha hiraṇyayo vetaso madhye agneriti
GV03sb_07_u:1590: ṛce tvetīha | prāṇo vā ṛkprāṇena hyarcati ruce tvetīha prāṇo vai rukprāṇena hi rocate
GV03sb_07_u:1591: 'tho prāṇāya hīdaṃ sarvaṃ rocate bhāse tvetīha jyotiṣe tvetīha bhāsvatī hīme
GV03sb_07_u:1592: jyotiṣmatī cakṣuṣī abhūdidaṃ viśvasya bhuvanasya vājinamagnervaiśvānarasya
GV03sb_07_u:1593: cetīhāgnirjyotiṣā jyotiṣmānrukbho varcasā varcasvānitīha viśvāvatībhyāṃ viśvaṃ hi
GV03sb_07_u:1596: atha puruṣaśīrṣamudgṛhṇāti | mahayatyevainadetatsahasradā asi sahasrāya tveti
GV03sb_07_u:1597: sarvaṃ vai sahasraṃ sarvasya dātāsi sarvasmai tvetyetat
GV03sb_07_u:1599: athainānupadadhāti | puruṣam prathamam puruṣaṃ tadvīryeṇāptvā dadhāti madhye
GV03sb_07_u:1603: aśvaṃ cāviṃ cottarata | etasyāṃ taddiśyetau paśū dadhāti tasmādetasyāṃ diśyetau paśū
GV03sb_07_u:1606: gāṃ cājaṃ ca dakṣiṇata | etasyāṃ taddiśyetau paśū dadhāti tasmādetasyāṃ diśyetau
GV03sb_07_u:1609: payasi puruṣamupadadhāti | paśavo vai payo yajamānaṃ tatpaśuṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1610: pratiṣṭhāpayatyādityaṃ garbham payasā samaṅgdhītyādityo vā eṣa garbho
GV03sb_07_u:1611: yatpuruṣastam payasā samaṅgdhītyetatsahasrasya pratimāṃ viśvarūpamiti puruṣo vai
GV03sb_07_u:1612: sahasrasya pratimā puruṣasya hyeva sahasram bhavati parivṛṅgdhi harasā
GV03sb_07_u:1613: mābhimaṃsthā iti paryenaṃ vṛṅgdhyarciṣā mainaṃ hiṃsīrityetacatāyuṣaṃ kṛṇuhi
GV03sb_07_u:1614: cīyamāna iti puruṣaṃ tatpaśūnāṃ śatāyuṃ karoti tasmātpuruṣa eva paśūnāṃ śatāyuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1616: athottarato 'śvam | vātasya jūtimiti vātasya vā eṣa jūtiryadaśvo varuṇasya nābhimiti
GV03sb_07_u:1617: vāruṇo hyaśvo 'śvaṃ jajñānaṃ sarirasya madhya ityāpo vai sariramapsujā u vā aśvaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1618: śiśuṃ nadīnāṃ harimadribudhnamiti girirvā adrirgiribudhnā u vā āpo 'gne mā hiṃsīḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1619: parame vyomannitīme vai lokāḥ paramaṃ vyomaiṣu lokeṣvenam mā hiṃsīrityetat
GV03sb_07_u:1621: atha dakṣiṇato gām | ajasramindumaruṣamiti somo vā induḥ sa haiṣa somo 'jasro
GV03sb_07_u:1623: gauḥ pūrvacittimitimiti prāñcaṃ hyagnimuddharanti prāñcamupacaranti sa
GV03sb_07_u:1624: parvabhirṛtuśaḥ kalpamāna iti yadvā eṣa cīyate tadeṣa parvabhirṛtuśaḥ kalpate gām
GV03sb_07_u:1625: mā hiṃsīraditiṃ virājamiti virāḍvai gaurannaṃ vai virāḍannamu gauḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1627: athottarato 'vim | varūtrīṃ tvaṣṭurvaruṇasya nābhimiti vāruṇī ca hi tvāṣṭrī cāviraviṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1628: jajñānāṃ rajasaḥ parasmāditi śrotraṃ vai paraṃ rajo diśo vai śrotram paraṃ rajo
GV03sb_07_u:1629: mahīṃ sāhasrīmasurasya māyāmiti mahatīṃ sāhasrīmasurasya māyāmityetadagne mā
GV03sb_07_u:1630: hiṃsīḥ parame vyomannitīme vai lokāḥ paramaṃ vyomaiṣu lokeṣvenam mā
GV03sb_07_u:1634: śokātpṛthivyā u ta vā divasparīti yadvai prajāpateḥ śokādajāyata taddivaśca pṛthivyai
GV03sb_07_u:1635: ca śokādajāyata yena prajā viśvakarmā jajāneti vāgvā ajo vāco vai prajā viśvakarmā
GV03sb_07_u:1636: jajāna tamagne heḍaḥ pari te vṛṇaktviti yathaiva yajustathā bandhuḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1638: ta ete paśavaḥ | tānnānopadadhāti nānā sādayati nānā sūdadohasādhivadati nānā hyete
GV03sb_07_u:1641: atha puruṣaśīrṣamabhijuhoti | āhutirvai yajñaḥ puruṣaṃ tatpaśūnāṃ yajñiyaṃ karoti
GV03sb_07_u:1644: yadvevainadabhijuhoti | śīrṣaṃstadvīryaṃ dadhātyājyena juhoti vajro vā ājyaṃ vīryaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1645: vai vajro vīryamevāsminnetaddadhāti svāhākāreṇa vṛṣā vai svāhākāro vīryaṃ vai
GV03sb_07_u:1646: vṛṣā vīryamevāsminnetaddadhāti priṣṭubhā vajro vai triṣṭubvīryaṃ vai vajro
GV03sb_07_u:1649: sa vā ardharcamanudrutya svāhākaroti | asthi vā ṛgidaṃ tacīrṣakapālaṃ vihāpya
GV03sb_07_u:1655: citraṃ devānāmudagādanīkamiti | asau vā āditya eṣa puruṣastadetaccitraṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1658: imāṃlokānāpūrayati sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaścetyeṣa hyasya sarvasyātmā yacca
GV03sb_07_u:1661: athotsargairupatiṣṭhata | etadvai yatraitānprajāpatiḥ paśūnālipsata ta ālipsyamānā
GV03sb_07_u:1665: taddhaike | yaṃ-yameva paśumupadadhati | tasyātasya śucamutsṛjanti necucam
GV03sb_07_u:1666: pāpmānamabhyupadadhāmahā iti te ha te śucam pāpmānamabhyupadadhati yāṃ hi
GV03sb_07_u:1669: viparikrāmamu haika upatiṣṭhante | ūrdhvāṃ śucamutsṛjāma iti te ha te śucam
GV03sb_07_u:1672: bāhyenaivāgnimutsṛjet | ime vai lokā eṣo 'gnirebhyastallokebhyo bahirdhā śucaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1673: dadhāti bahirvedīyaṃ vai vedirasyai tadbahirdhā śucaṃ dadhātyudaṅ tiṣṭhannetasyāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1676: puruṣasya prathamamutsṛjati | taṃ hi prathamamupadadhātīmam mā
GV03sb_07_u:1677: hiṃsīrdvipādam paśumiti dvipādvā eṣa paśuryatpuruṣastam mā
GV03sb_07_u:1678: hiṃsīrityetatsahasrākṣo medhāya cīyamāna iti hiraṇyaśakalairvā eṣa sahasrākṣo
GV03sb_07_u:1679: medhāyetyannāyetyetanmayum paśum medhamagne juṣasveti kimpuruṣo vai
GV03sb_07_u:1680: mayuḥ kimpuruṣamagne juṣasvetyetattena cinvānastanvo niṣīdetyātmā vai
GV03sb_07_u:1681: tanūstena cinvāna ātmānaṃ saṃskuruṣvetyetanmayuṃ te śugṛcatu yaṃ dviṣmastaṃ te
GV03sb_07_u:1682: śugṛcatviti tanmayau ca śucaṃ dadhāti yaṃ ca dveṣṭi tasmiṃśca
GV03sb_07_u:1684: athāśvasya | imam mā hiṃsīrekaśapham paśumityekaśapho vā eṣa paśuryadaśvastam
GV03sb_07_u:1685: mā hiṃsīrityetatkanikradaṃ vājinaṃ vājineṣviti kanikrado vā eṣa vājyu vājineṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1686: gauramāraṇyamanu te diśāmīti tadasmai gauramāraṇyamanudiśati tena

GV03sb_07_u:1688: yaṃ dviṣamastaṃ te śugṛcatviti tadgaure ca śucaṃ dadhāti yaṃ ca dveṣṭi tasmiṃśca

GV03sb_07_u:1695: tena cinvānastanvo niṣīdeti tena cinvāna ātmānaṃ saṃskuruṣvetyetadgavayaṃ te
GV03sb_07_u:1696: śugṛcatu yaṃ dviṣāstaṃ te śugṛcatviti tadgavaye ca śucaṃ dadhāti yaṃ ca dveṣṭi
GV03sb_07_u:1700: paśūnāṃ dvipadāṃ catuṣpadāmityubhayeṣāṃ haiṣa paśūnāṃ tvagdvipadāṃ ca
GV03sb_07_u:1701: catuṣpadāṃ ca tvaṣṭuḥ prajānām prathamaṃ janitramityetaddha tvaṣṭā prathamaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1702: rūpaṃ vicakārāgne mā hiṃsīḥ parame vyomannitīme vai lokāḥ paramaṃ vyomaiṣu
GV03sb_07_u:1703: lokeṣvenam mā hiṃsīrityetaduṣṭramāraṇyamanu te diśāmīti tadasmā
GV03sb_07_u:1704: uṣṭramāran\yamanudiśati tena cinvānastanvo niṣīdeti tena cinvāna ātmānaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1705: saṃskuraṣvetyetaduṣṭraṃ te śugṛcatu yaṃ dviṣmastaṃ te śugṛcatviti taduṣṭre ca
GV03sb_07_u:1706: śucaṃ dadhāti yaṃ ca dveṣṭi tasmiṃśca
GV03sb_07_u:1708: athājasya | ajo hyagnerajaniṣṭa śo kāditi yadvai prajāpateḥ śokādajāyata tadagneḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1709: śokādajāyata so apaśyajjanitāramagra iti prajāpatirvai janitā so paśyatprajāpatimagra
GV03sb_07_u:1710: ityetattena devā devatāmagra āyanniti vāgvā ajo vāco vai devā
GV03sb_07_u:1711: devatāmagramāyaṃstena rohamāyannupa medhyāsa iti svargo vai loko rohastena
GV03sb_07_u:1712: svargaṃ lokamāyunnupa medhyāsa ityetacarabhamāraṇyamanu te diśāmīti tadasmai
GV03sb_07_u:1713: śarabhamāraṇyamanudiśati tena cinvānastanvo niṣīdeti tena cinvāna ātmānaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1714: saṃskuruṣvetyetacarabhaṃ te śugṛcatu yaṃ dviṣmastaṃ te śugṛcatviti tacarabhe ca
GV03sb_07_u:1715: śucaṃ dadhāti yaṃ ca dveṣṭi tasmiṃśca
GV03sb_07_u:1717: tadāhuḥ | yāṃ vai tatprajāpatireteṣām paśūnāṃ śucam pāpmānamapāhaṃsta ete pañca
GV03sb_07_u:1718: paśavo 'bhavaṃsta eta utkrāntamedhā amedhyā ayajñiyāsteṣām brāhmaṇo
GV03sb_07_u:1719: nāśnīyāttānetasyāṃ diśi dadhāti tasmādetasyāṃ diśi parjanyo na varṣuko yatraite
GV03sb_07_u:1722: pratyetyāgnimupatiṣṭhate | etadvā etadayathāyathaṃ karoti yadagnau sāmicite
GV03sb_07_u:1723: bahirvedyeti tasmā evaitannihnute 'hiṃsāyā āgneyyāgnaya evaitannihnute gāyatryā
GV03sb_07_u:1725: vā aniruktaṃ sarveṇaivāsmā etannihnute yaviṣṭavatyaitaddhāsya priyaṃ dhāma
GV03sb_07_u:1726: yadyaviṣṭha iti yadvai jāta idaṃ sarvamayuvata tasmādyaviṣṭhaḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1728: tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣa iti | yajamāno vai dāśvānnṛḥ pāhīti manuṣyā vai naraḥ
GV03sb_07_u:1729: śṛṇudhī gira iti śṛṇu na imāṃ stutimityetadrakṣā tokamuta tmaneti prajā vai tokaṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1732: āruhyāgniṃ jaghanena svayamātṛṇām parītyāpasyā upadadhāti | āpa etā yadapasyā
GV03sb_07_u:1733: atha vā etebhyaḥ paśubhya āpa utkrāntā bhavanti tadyadapasyā
GV03sb_07_u:1736: paśavaḥ sarvata upadadhāti sarvata evaiṣvetadapo dadhāti
GV03sb_07_u:1738: tadyāḥ pañcadaśa pūrvāḥ | tā apasyā vajro vā āpo vajraḥ pañcadaśastasmāṃdyenāpo
GV03sb_07_u:1739: yantyapaiva tatra pāpmānaṃ ghnanti vajro haiva tasyārdhasya pāpmānamapahanti
GV03sb_07_u:1742: atha yāḥ pañcottarāḥ | tāścandasyāḥ paśavo vai candāṃsyannam paśavo 'nnamu
GV03sb_07_u:1743: paśormāṃsamatha vā etebhyaḥ paśubhyo māṃsānyutkrāntāni bhavanti tadyaccandasyā
GV03sb_07_u:1745: upadadhātyanantarhitāni tatpaśubhyo māṃsāni dadhātyantarā apasyā bhavanti
GV03sb_07_u:1748: tadāhuḥ | yadimā āpa etāni māṃsānyatha kva tvakvva lometyannaṃ vāva
GV03sb_07_u:1749: paśostvagannaṃ loma tadyaccandasyā upadadhāti saiva paśostvaktallomātho
GV03sb_07_u:1750: yānyamūnyukhāyāmajalomāni tāni lomāni bāhyokhā bhavatyantarāṇi paśuśīrṣāṇi
GV03sb_07_u:1751: bāhyāni hi lomānyantara ātmā yadītareṇa yadītareṇeti ha smāha śāṇḍilyaḥ sarvāneva
GV03sb_07_u:1758: sa yaḥ sa prajāpatirvyasraṃsata | ayameva sa yo 'yamagniścīyate 'tha yā asmāttā āpa
GV03sb_07_u:1759: āyannetāstā apasyāstadyadetā upadadhāti yā evāsmāttā āpa āyaṃstā
GV03sb_07_u:1762: apāṃ tvemantsādayāmīti | vāyurvā apāmema yadā hyevaiṣa itaścetaśca vātyathāpo
GV03sb_07_u:1765: apāṃ tvodmantsādayāmīti | oṣadhayo vā apāmodma yatra hyāpa undantyastiṣṭhanti
GV03sb_07_u:1768: apāṃ tvā bhasmantsādayāmīti | abhraṃ vā apām bhasmābhre tāṃ sādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1770: apāṃ tvā jyotiṣi sādayāmīti | vidyudvā apāṃ jyotirvidyuti tāṃ sādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1772: apāṃ tvāyane sādayāmīti | iyaṃ vā apāmayanamasyāṃ hyāpo yantyasyāṃ tāṃ sādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1773: tadyā asyaitebhyo rūpebhya āpa āyaṃstā asminnetatpratidadhātyatho
GV03sb_07_u:1776: arṇave tvā sadane sādayāmīti | prāṇo vā arṇavaḥ prāṇe tāṃ sādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1778: samudre tvā sadane sādayāmīti | mano vai samudrā manaso vai samudrādvācābhryā
GV03sb_07_u:1781: nirvapaṇaṃ dadhuriti manaḥ samudro vāktīkṣṇābhristrayī vidyā nirvapaṇametadeṣa
GV03sb_07_u:1784: sarire tvā sadane sādayāmīti | vāgvai sariraṃ vāci tāṃ sādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1786: apāṃ tvā kṣaye sādayāmīti | cakṣurvā apāṃ kṣayastatra hi sarvadaivāpaḥ kṣiyanti
GV03sb_07_u:1789: apāṃ tvā sadhiṣi sādayāmīti | otraṃ vā apāṃ sadhiḥ śrotre tāṃ sādayati tadyā
GV03sb_07_u:1793: apāṃ tvā sadane sādayāmīti | dyaurvā apāṃ sadanaṃ divi hyāpaḥ sannā divi tāṃ
GV03sb_07_u:1796: apāṃ tvā sadhasthe sādayāmīti antarikṣaṃ vā apāṃ sadhasthamantarikṣe tāṃ sādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1798: apāṃ tvā yonau sādayāmīti | samudro vā apāṃ yoniḥ samudre tāṃ sādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1800: apāṃ tvā purīṣe sādayāmīti | sikatā vā apām purīṣaṃ sikatāsu tāṃ sādayati
GV03sb_07_u:1802: apāṃ tvā pāthasi sādayāmīti | annaṃ vā apām pātho 'nne tāṃ sādayati tadyā
GV03sb_07_u:1806: gāyatreṇa tvā candasā sādayāmi | traiṣṭubhena tvā candasā sādayāmi jāgatena tvā
GV03sb_07_u:1807: candasā sādayāmyānuṣṭubhena tvā candasā sādayāmi pāṅktena tvā candamā
GV03sb_07_u:1808: sādayāmīti tadyā asyaitebhyaścandobhya āpa āyaṃstā asminnetatpratidadhātyatho
GV03sb_07_u:1811: tā etā aṅgulayaḥ | tāḥ | sarvata upadadhāti sarvato hīmā aṅgulayo
GV03sb_07_u:1813: pañca-pañcopadadhāti pañca-pañca hīmā aṅgulayo nānopadadhāti nānā hīmā
